000533.SZ.summary: Guangdong Shunna Electric Co., Ltd. provides power transmission and distribution equipment in China. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China.

000541.SZ.summary: Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co., Ltd., designs, manufactures, and markets lighting products and electrical equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products primarily include LED light sources and luminaries, automotive LED luminaries, traditional lighting products, and switches and sockets, as well as LED indoor and outdoor lighting products, electrical tapes, and switch panels. Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

000988.SZ.summary: Huagong Tech Company Limited manufactures and sells laser equipment, optical communication devices, laser holographic anti-counterfeiting products, and sensors and information tracing in China and internationally. The company offers proton diagnosis and treatment equipment; and laser smart equipment, such as laser cutting systems, laser welding systems, laser marking products, laser texturing equipment, laser heat treatment systems, laser drilling machines, lasers and various supporting devices, laser processing equipment and plasma cutting equipment, etc. It also provides Laser holographic anti-counterfeiting products, including positioning / non-positioning laser bronzing film, universal version of laser bronzing film, laser anti-counterfeiting packaging materials and integrated encryption anti-counterfeiting mark, holographic two-dimensional code, positioning transfer paper, etc. In addition, the company offers sensor products, such as NTC and PTC series thermistors, and automotive electronics to provide multi-dimensional sensing and control solutions; and optical communication products, such as source optical devices, passive optical devices, intelligent terminals, optical components, etc. Additionally, it provides cloud computing, intelligent manufacturing service platform, license industry anti-counterfeiting, energy industry laser processing, aerospace application, 3C industry laser processing, and automotive industry application solutions. Its products are used in consumer electronics, mechanical manufacturing, communication networks, automobile, aviation, iron and steel metallurgy, shipbuilding and national military defense. Huagong Tech Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuhan, China.

001210.KS.summary: Kumho Electric, Inc. manufactures and sells lighting solutions in South Korea. The company offers general lighting products, such as fluorescent, electrodeless, incandescent, halogen, and CDM/HQI lamps; electronic ballasts; and electronic insect control systems. It also provides various LED lighting products; and back light units. The company was formerly known as Chungyup Manufacturing Co. and changed its name to Kumho Electric, Inc. in 1978. Kumho Electric, Inc. was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

001440.KS.summary: Taihan Electric Wire Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and installs electric and communication cable systems worldwide. The company provides power generation and distribution cables, including extra-high voltage cables, overhead transmission lines, electric power cables, insulated wires, nuclear cables, halogen-free flame retardant cables, fire protection cables, control cables, instrumentation/signal cables, high voltage direct current cables, and subsea cables. It also offers communication, data, coaxial, railway signaling, optical, and UL style cables, as well as accessories; base metal products, such as copper rods and magnet wires; and heating systems, trolley wires, and factory automation cables. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Anyang, South Korea.

002028.SZ.summary: Sieyuan Electric Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services power transmission and distribution equipment in China and internationally. The company offers relay protection equipment and monitoring system for substations; circuit breakers and disconnectors; power capacitors; current and voltage transformers; and grounding devices, reactors, dynamic reactive power compensation products, active filtering devices, DGA and online monitoring systems, etc. Sieyuan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002058.SZ.summary: Shanghai Welltech Automation Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial automation instruments and meters in China. The company's industrial automation instruments and meters products consists pressure transmitters; home flowmeters that include ele flowmeters, vortex flowmeters, ele water meters, and ele heat meters; temperature measuring instruments; control valves; and electric actuators. It also provides system integration products; and thermal mass flowmeters, metal rotor flow meters, turbine flow meters, ultrasonic flow meters, throttling devices, ultrasonic liquids, and magnetic products. Shanghai Welltech Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002074.SZ.summary: Gotion High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and operation of lithium-ion batteries and materials in China and internationally. The company also offers power transmission and transformation equipment. Its principal products include LFP and NCM materials and batteries, battery packs, BMS, and energy storage battery packs. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Hefei, China.

002130.SZ.summary: ShenZhen Woer Heat-Shrinkable Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of heat-shrinkable materials in China. The company offers heat shrinkable sleeves, busbar, and cable accessories; cold shrink cable accessories; cable branch boxes; ring network cabinets; high and low voltage switchgear; and WQFB fully insulated closed busbar, as well as high temperature silicone products, such as high temperature resistant PTFE casing, conductor connecting tubes, heat shrinkable composite double wall tubes, silicone rubber tubes, PTFE casing, civil non-slip pattern tubes, halogen-free environmental protection PE cross-linked wires, etc. It also provides dual and single wall products, separable connectors mated products, accessories, busbar connection systems, inner cone plug-in products, cables, wires, chargers, connectors, and other products. The company serves electronics, power, metallurgy, petrochemical, automotive, high-speed rail, coal mine, and aerospace sectors. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002141.SZ.summary: Infund Holding Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells fine and special enameled wires for electronic information, automobile, household appliance, and defense technology industries primarily in China, Southeast Asia, and Europe. It offers polyurethane enameled copper round wires for use in small motors, small transformers, magnetic heads, telecommunication equipment coils, ignition coils, micro-motors, mini-transformers, and water valves, as well as in power, high frequency, time, automotive, telecom, and sealed relays. The company also offers polyester enameled copper round wires for use in general purpose motors, portable generators, heat-resistance transformers, contactors, electromagnetic valves, coils for electronical communications and illuminating apparatus, and hermetic diving motors. In addition, it provides polyester-imide enameled copper round wires for heat-resistance motors, automotive components, reversing valves, coils of induction cooker, motors for electric tools, magnetos, dry-type transformers, automotive relays, and heat-resistance transformers. Further, the company offers self-bonding enameled copper round wires comprising polyurethane enameled copper round wires with a bonding layer for use in speaker coils, driving motors for watch, vibrator motors, laser head and magnetic head coils, and other non-frame coils; and thermosetting type polyester or polyesterimide enameled copper round wires with a bonding layer for use in high output voice coils and motors, electrical tools, and heat-resistance motors. Additionally, it provides fine rectangular magnet wires. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Ronsen Super Micro-Wire Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Infund Holding Co., Ltd. in January 2017. Infund Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

002168.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Hifuture Information Technology Co., Ltd.
002168.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Hifuture Information Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, sells, installs, and distributes network integrated solutions of electrical equipment with insulation and miniaturization in China and internationally. The company offers electric distribution net products, such as medium pressure products, IA gas insulated ring network cabinets, IA solid insulating rings, intelligent switch on columns, Hdkf products, box type fixed switchgears, box type ring network switching equipment, Withdrawout metal clad and metal enclosed switchgears, outdoor high voltage AC drop type fuses, prefabricated substations, tube bus product information products, SMC products, and cable accessories, as well as system solutions. It also provides network traffic management services based on the marketing with data; and researches, develops, and distributes mobile games. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Hifuture Electric Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Hifuture Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002276.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wanma Co., Ltd. produces and sells power cables. The company offers 1-500kV XLPE, plastic, computer, low voltage, 1-35kV aerial, waterproof, underground, prefabricated branched power, and aerial insulation cables, as well as set cables for special conditions. It also provides wires and cables for electrical equipment; bare, aluminum stranded, and steel-cored aluminum stranded wires; copper and aluminum rods; special, mine, coaxial, silicon rubber, and fluorin plastic cables; and cable accessories, such as cable terminals and middle connectors. The company offers its products for use in electrical power, communication, petrochemistry, railway, metallurgy, and steel industries. It has operations in China, Southeast Asia, Japan, the United States, the European Union, and Russia. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002298.SZ.long_name: Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002298.SZ.summary: Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. provides system integrator, equipment and integrated solution, and system operation services in China. The company offers smart city integrated management platform for security; and HD network cameras. It also provides energy storage and charging pile systems, high and low voltage power products, high and low voltage component products, automation products, transformers, power quality control products. The company offers its products under the iChinaE, SINONET, FIAMM, and other brands. The company was formerly known as Anhui Xinlong Electrical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2015. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wuhu, China.

002300.SZ.long_name: Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co., Ltd.
002300.SZ.summary: Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells wires and cables in China. It offers aluminum alloy conductor XLPE insulated power cables, mining rubber flexible cables, control cables, PVC insulated wires, PVC and XLPE insulated power cables, overhead insulated cables, and photovoltaic cables. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Nanping, China.

002309.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Zhongli Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells wires and cables in China and internationally. It provides power, wind, control, data, marine, mine, rail transit, photoelectric composite, electronic line of certification, automobile, board coaxial, communication, and aluminum alloy cables, as well as overhead conductors and steel core aluminum standard wires. The company also offers distribution, dielectric self-supported fiber optic, feeder, and home segment cable products, as well as outdoor central beam tubed optical fiber and outdoor self-supporting optical fiber cable products; polymer materials; solar products; and packaging products. In addition, it provides WLAN, smart grid, shipboard cable, high-speed railway cable, rail transit, new energy cable, and automobile cable solutions, as well as FTTX optical-fiber network integrated and solar roof solutions. Further, the company offers intelligent communication automatic net equipment; and operates photovoltaic power stations. It serves communication, equipment manufacturing, rail transit, power, mining, ship and ocean engineering, solar new energy, electric power transmission, architecture, aerospace device, photovoltaic and wind energy power station, and automobile industries. The company was formerly known as Zhongli Science and Technology Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Zhongli Group Co., Ltd. in February 2017. Jiangsu Zhongli Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1988 and is based in Changshu, China.

002335.SZ.summary: Kehua Data Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of renewable energy and data center products under the Kehua brand name worldwide. It offers central inverters, inverter containers, and central distribution systems; energy storage systems and converters, and storage batteries; grid-tied PV and string inverters; solar controllers, off grid inverters and chargers, single and three phase inverters, and 48V inverters; charging modules, and AC and DC chargers; combiner boxes and Pb-C batteries; and other customized products. The company also provides online transformer-based, online transformer less, modular, line interactive, offline, lithium, and DC UPS; telecom inverter, static transfer switch, and industry UPS systems; and customized products comprising voltage and frequency adjustable UPS systems. In addition, it offers accessories, including 3 phase ATS racks, 3 phase bypass maintenance racks, 3 phase input racks, 3 phase lightning protection racks, 3 phase UPS distribution racks, batter racks, lead-acid batteries, MMBMs, PDU modules, single phase composite racks, single phase lightning protection racks, SNMPs, 3 phase voltage regulators, AC distribution cabinets, active power filters, battery cabinets, chargers, distribution cabinets, outdoor cabinets, power distribution cabinets, rack battery cabinets, and wall-mounted lightning protection products. Further, the company provides data center systems; and SNMP adapters, data collection devices, data center monitoring and management systems, data acquisition modules, leakage sensor modules, contact monitor modules, and GSM modules. The company was formerly known as Kehua Hengsheng Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kehua Data Co., Ltd. in January 2021. Kehua Data Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

002346.SZ.summary: Shanghai Zhezhong Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sets of switching equipment in China. It operates through Industrial and Building Installation Industry segments. The company offers complete sets of switching equipment; spare parts; and PHC pipe piles. It also provides building installation services. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Zhezhong Construction Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Zhezhong Group Co., Ltd. in March 2015. Shanghai Zhezhong Group Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Zhezhong Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Kang Feng Investment Management Company Limited.

002356.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Hemei Group Co.,LTD. engages in the tourism, finance, smart technology, and Internet technology businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates 200 boutique stores that provide jewelry, men's wear, women's wear, casual wear, sportswear, children's wear, and shoes primarily in France, Italy, Germany, Switzerland, and Spain. The company also offers products and services, such as consumer loans, industrial investment, financing, financial services, brand funds, etc. In addition, it provides smart home, intelligent hardware, and new energy products; and Internet technology products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Haoningda Meters Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Hemei Group Co.,LTD. in May 2016. Shenzhen Hemei Group Co.,LTD. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002358.SZ.summary: Henan Senyuan Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sales of high, medium, and low voltage power generation, transmission, and distribution equipment in China and internationally. It also researches and develops, designs, produces, constructs, installs, operates, and maintains energy power plants, port power supply facilities, energy saving, and emission reduction facilities. The company's products include charging station equipment; high and medium voltage switchgears; pre-installed transformer substation and switching station; switchgears for rail traction; medium voltage switch elements; medium/low voltage electric power quality correction equipment; microprocessor protection devices and systems; transformers; medium voltage mutual inductors and embedded poles; low voltage switch elements and switchgears; photovoltaic power generation systems; insulators; molding copper contact/rows; and intelligent independent power supply systems. Its products are used in national grid, energy, rail transit, petrochemical, building materials, municipal, medical and health, metallurgy, and other fields. Henan Senyuan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changge, China.

002364.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Zhongheng Electric Co., Ltd. provides electric power information and electronics products in China, Asia, Africa, Europe, the United States, Oceania, and internationally. The company offers communication power supply, HVDC, electric power supply, electric vehicle charging piles, mobile charging vehicles, remote supply new energy, metro PSD power supply, and smart lighting drive power supply products, as well as electric power information technology and energy Internet products. It also provides communication power supply; electric operation power supply; new energy electric vehicle charging/swap system; smart lighting; energy storage products; and power supply integrated solutions. The company serves power grid enterprises, power generation companies, and industrial enterprises. Hangzhou Zhongheng Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002388.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Sunyes Electronic Manufacturing Holding Co., Ltd.
002388.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunyes Electronic Manufacturing Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of electronic manufacturing solutions, and provision of services for electronic manufacturing systems in China and internationally. The company offers soldering equipment, such as soldering stations, lead-free solder bars/wires, rework stations, soldering pots, desoldering pumps, solder wire stands, smoke absorbers, electric irons, hot air guns, thermometers, and system testers. It also provides fastening technology products comprising electric screwdrivers, electric power supplies, torque meters, digital force gauges, automatic screw suppliers, torque screwdrivers, dispensing controllers, tape dispensers, and ceramic screwdrivers. In addition, the company offers antistatic technology products, including ionizing blowers and air guns, surface resistance testers, wrist strap testers, multi-functional testers, and body antistatic products, as well as antistatic wrist straps, brushes, tweezers, and racks. Further, it provides optical technology products consisting of magnifying lamps and magnifiers; moisture-proof cabinets; and hand tools and other products, such as pliers, counters, spring balances, alcohol bottles, and others. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002471.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Zhongchao Holding Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wires and cables in China. The company's products include power cables, wires and cables for electrical equipment, bare wires, flame-retardant ultra-high voltage cross-linked cables, aluminum alloy overhead lines, computer cables, control cables, frequency conversion cables, compensation wires and cables, overhead wires, universal rubber sheathed flexible cables, branch cables, and intrinsically safe cables. Its products are primarily used in the construction and reconstruction of urban and rural power grids. The company also exports its products to India, Vietnam, Australia, Oman, Sudan, Tanzania, Nigeria, Kenya, Sri Lanka, Mauritius, South Africa, Brazil, Cyprus, and other countries. The company was formerly was formerly known as Jiangsu Zhongchao Cable Corporation and changed its name to Jiangsu Zhongchao Holding Co., Ltd. in September 2015. Jiangsu Zhongchao Holding Co., Ltd. is based in Yixing, China.

002484.SZ.summary: Nantong Jianghai Capacitor Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, and service of capacitors, related materials, and accessories in the People's Republic of China. The company offers aluminum electrolytic capacitors, including screw type, snap-in, radial, and polymer capacitors; film capacitors, such as DC-link and snubber capacitors; and super capacitors comprising radial, snap-in, and coin type capacitors. Its products are used in various fields, including industrial automation, power supply, consumer electronics, lifting equipment, transportation, and new energy sectors. The company also exports its products. Nantong Jianghai Capacitor Co. Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Nantong, the People's Republic of China.

002491.SZ.summary: Tongding Interconnection Information Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of optical preform, fibers and cables, various types of communication cables, and communication devices in the People's Republic of China. It also provides network security equipment and services, big data analysis and operation services, etc. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Tongding Optic-Electronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tongding Interconnection Information Co., Ltd. in January 2015. The company is based in Wujiang, the People's Republic of China.

002498.SZ.summary: Qingdao Hanhe Cable Co.,Ltd researches and develops, manufactures, and supplies cables and wires primarily in the People's Republic of China. The company offers power cables, cable accessories, submarine cables, optical power composite cables, electrical equipment wires and cables, overhead conductors, communication cables, radio-frequency cables, bus bar and prefabricated branch cables, nuclear plant cables, fire-resistant cables, and DC series cables. It also provides shipboard and mining cables, heat-resistant and high-strength aluminum alloy wires, carbon fiber wires, data cables, oil platform cables, wind farm cables, and flame retardant cables, as well as services of laying, installation, and completion test for cables and cable accessories. In addition, the company offers high-voltage electrical equipment status monitoring products for smart transformer substations and cable fault testing systems; electrical equipment testing services for customers in power, metallurgy, chemical and petroleum industries; electric power design, engineering, and installation services; and operation maintenance services for transformer substations. Its products are used in the fields of power, metallurgy, telecommunication, railway, petroleum and chemical, coal mining, construction, etc. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions. Qingdao Hanhe Cable Co.,Ltd was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Qingdao, the People's Republic of China.

002518.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen KSTAR Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
002518.SZ.summary: Shenzhen KSTAR Science and Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells data center infrastructure products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers data center products, such as UPS, battery, and precision cooling products, as well as integrated solutions for use in finance, communication, government, enterprise, and data center construction fields. It also provides PV inverters, including string, energy storage, central, container, monitoring, and combiner box inverters, as well as residential and commercial PV, and utility PV inverter solutions. Shenzhen KSTAR Science and Technology Co., Ltd. also offers its products and services to approximately 90 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002533.SZ.summary: Gold cup Electric Apparatus Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells wires and cables in Central, Southern, and Western China. It offers electrical equipment wire, including non-sheathed and sheathed cable, flexible cable and wire, screened cable, low smoke halogen free flame retardant wire, exquisite flame retardant wire, high-end easy home wire, radiated European standard wire, computer cable, plastics insulated and sheathed control cable products. The company also provides cable and conductor products comprising plastics insulated power cable, XLPE insulated cable, XLPE insulated power cable, areial insulated cable, and overhead conductor; and aluminum alloy and flexible MI fireproof cable products. In addition, it offers rubber flexible, mining, elevator, motor winding lead, waterproof rubber sheathed, silicon rubber insulated and sheathed flexible, butyronitrile compound insulation and sheathed power, internal connecting, rail transit, ship power, and PV cables, as well as copper core. The company offers its products for use in power projects, railways, construction machinery, minerals, aviation, buildings, electrical appliance, transformer companies, etc. It also exports its products to Europe, Australia, Kenya, Angola, Vietnam, Maldives, Malaysia, and Singapore. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

002546.SZ.summary: Nanjing Xinlian Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets electricity information collection systems for the power industry in China. The company provides intelligent power distribution equipment and systems, and distribution automation equipment. It also offers energy management systems, smart energy cloud platforms, power cabinet systems, low-voltage complete sets, and power communication detection systems. In addition, the company provides integrated energy services and solutions to grid enterprises and enterprise users. Nanjing Xinlian Electronics Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

002580.SZ.long_name: Shandong Sacred Sun Power Sources Co., Ltd.
002580.SZ.summary: Shandong Sacred Sun Power Sources Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes reserve power and motive power batteries worldwide. Its reserve power batteries are used in the telecom and utility industries, uninterruptible power supplies, and various applications requiring stored energy solutions, including solar and wind renewable energy; and motive power batteries are used in electric forklifts and other commercial electric powered vehicles. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Qufu, China.

002606.SZ.summary: Dalian Insulator Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, production, and sale of electrical porcelain and composite insulators, station post insulators, and porcelain hardware fittings in China. The company offers long rod suspension composite, disc suspension porcelain, ground wire, composite post and hollow, and ceramic hollow and post insulators. It also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. The company was founded in 1915 and is based in Dalian, the People's Republic of China.

002617.SZ.summary: Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale of electromagnetic products in China. The company's principal products include composite enameled copper round wires, variable frequency enameled copper round wires, self-adhesive enameled copper round wires, corona enamelled copper round wires, enameled round aluminum wires, and various ultra-fine enameled wires. Its products are used in the home appliance, electric power, telecommunication, electronic, medical equipment, automobile, wind power generation, power supply equipment, and aerospace fields. The company also offers motors. In addition, it invests in, designs, constructs, operates, services, and distributes photovoltaic power plants. The company also exports its products to the United States, Brazil, Japan, Italy, Mexico, and Slovakia. Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002638.SZ.summary: Dongguan Kingsun Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells LED lighting products worldwide. The company offers street lights, tunnel lights, wall packs, garden lights, bollards, parking lot lights, and solar lights for roads and areas; high bay and low bay lights, and canopy lights for industrial applications; and flood, projection, wallwash, in-ground, linear, and pixel lights for architectural applications. It also provides smart lights, bulbs, tubes, battens, downlights, panel lights, spotlights, ceiling lights, pendant lights, table lamps, floor lights, and wall lights for residential and commercial applications. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002684.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
002684.SZ.summary: Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells lead batteries and fittings, plastic products, and related products primarily in China. Its lead batteries comprise gel nanotechnology, sealed activated AGM, and factory activated maintenance free batteries; maintenance free batteries with acid packs; and high performance and conventional dry charge batteries. The company offers its products for motorcycles and vehicle starting, electric vehicles, back-up power, telecommunication and lightening, storage power, etc. It sells its products under the MENSHY, DYNAVOLT, etc. brands in approximately 90 countries. The company was formerly known as Dynavolt Renewable Power Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

002706.SZ.summary: Shanghai Liangxin Electrical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces low-voltage electrical apparatus in China. The company offers frame breakers, molded case circuit breakers, dual power supply products, disconnectors, miniature circuit breakers, and electromagnetic circuit breakers. It also provides industrial products comprising contactors, contactor relays, switch capacitor contactors, starters, switches, thermal relays, and motor protection circuit breakers. It serves the energy, telecommunications, construction, electricity, industrial, and other industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002730.SZ.summary: Dianguang Explosion-proof Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of explosion protection electrical appliances in China. It offers H.V. vacuum breakers and LED laneway lamps; mining explosion-proof cap lamps, vacuum feeder switches, vacuum electromagnetic starters, dry type transformers, and movable substations; and explosion protection power distribution boxes, maintenance power socket boxes, manipulators, and connection chambers. The company also provides explosion protection luminescent lighting, floodlight, metal halide lamp, and exit signal lighting products, as well as LED explosion-proof lighting products; and weatherproof distribution boxes and manipulators. It has applications in various sectors, including coal and non-coal mining, electric power, oil refineries, chemical and petrochemical plants, onshore and offshore plants, low temperatures, fuel depots, and fuel tanker loading/unloading areas. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wenzhou, China. Dianguang Explosion-Proof Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Dianguang Technology Co.,Ltd.

002782.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Click Technology Co., Ltd. designs, produces, sells, and services LED lighting power supplies, power battery chargers, communication power supplies, adapters, magnetic components, electric car chargers, charging piles, inverters, and others in the People's Republic of China. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, Australia, South America, and other Asian countries and regions. Shenzhen Click Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002845.SZ.summary: Shenzhen TXD Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, production, and sale of liquid crystal display module products for private enterprises. It offers TFT liquid crystal display modules, touch display integrated modules, camera modules, AMOLED, full screen, and other products that are used in mobile phones, tablet computers, digital cameras, Medical equipment display, instrumentation, vehicle display, and other fields. The company sells its products in China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan. Shenzhen TXD Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002849.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Viewshine Intelligent Meter Co.,Ltd develops and supplies smart metering technology and solutions for gas and water customers worldwide. The company offers basic and smart ultrasonic water meters; ultrasonic-residential, ultrasonic-C&I, and mechanical-residential gas meters; Enhanced Metering and Billing Cloud, a modularization-design software; and gateways, repeaters, and HHU devices. Its solutions include AMI, a solution that provides various options of communication, smart meters, and structures for residential, commercial, and industrial applications; Walk-by solution, which consists of wireless smart meter, HHU, converter, and management software; and Prepayment solutions. Zhejiang Viewshine Intelligent Meter Co.,Ltd is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002860.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Star Shuaier Electric Appliance Co., Ltd.
002860.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Star Shuaier Electric Appliance Co., Ltd. designs, researches, develops, produces, and markets overload protectors for compressors and starters in China and internationally. The Company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002869.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides equipment and solutions for intelligent transportation in China and internationally. It offers system integrator services for intelligent transportation and the Internet of vehicles; and highway intelligent transportation, urban intelligent transportation, public security traffic management, and V2X solutions. The company's products include ETC intelligent terminal and microwave roadside units, OBU classic and issue terminals, and IC card readers and writers; lane controllers and vehicle identification RSUs for urban parking; radio frequency identification (RFID) readers and writers, read-and-write antennas, and lane controllers, as well as ceramic RFID tags; and roadside and on board units, and communication modules. It serves government, operators, and end users. Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002876.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunnypol Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LCD polarizers in China. It offers polarizers for LCDs and 3D glasses, protective films for FPD, and brightness enhancement polarizers. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002882.SZ.summary: Jinlongyu Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of wires and cables in China. The company offers low smoke halogen free, low smoke halogen free flame retardant, fire resistant low smoke halogen, fire resistant, flame retardant, and aluminum alloy wires and cables, as well as waterproof, anti-ant, branch cables, etc. It also provides PVC insulated and sheathed power cables; and XLPE insulated power cables. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002892.SZ.summary: Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells micro motors in China. The company offers single-phase shaded pole motors, single-phase universal motors, step motors, cross flow blowers, DC brushless motors, servo systems, reduction gear motors, and pumps. These motors are used in microwave oven, exhaust fan, oven, fan heater, electric fireplace, air conditioner, food processor, hair dryer, air pump, vacuum cleaner, paper shredder, air pump, water pump (dishwasher washer pump and draining pump), garden tools, electric tools, household appliances, printer, scanner, lighting, camera-control monitor, other IT lines, and industrial control equipment. Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. also exports its products to the United States, Germany, Italy, Spain, Poland, Australia, Turkey, Syria, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Hunan Keli Motor Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002922.SZ.summary: Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (China) Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells products and solutions of power supply and components in China and internationally. The company offers LED drivers, LED application products, switching power supply products, power supply transformers, inductors, special type transformers, reactors, and distribution transformers. Its products are used in applications, such as lighting, new energy, electricity utility, industrial control, etc. The company was formerly known as Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (Foshan) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (China) Co., Ltd. in 2011. Eaglerise Electric & Electronic (China) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

002927.SZ.summary: Guizhou Taiyong-Changzheng Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells low-voltage circuit breakers in China. The company offers universal, plastic case, molded case leakage protection, and miniature circuit breakers; and medium and low voltage dual power conversion switch electrical appliances, industrial and fire pump controllers, electrical fire monitoring products, etc. It offers its products in railway, airport, hospital, highway, finance, petrochemical, power grid, telecommunication, energy, real estate construction, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Guizhou Changzheng Switch Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guizhou Taiyong-Changzheng Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Guizhou Taiyong-Changzheng Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Zunyi, China. The company is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Yongtai Technology Co., Ltd.

002979.SZ.summary: China Leadshine Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells motion control products in the worldwide. The company's products include stepper drives and motors, integrated steppers, closed loop stepper drives and motors, integrated easy servo motors, integrated servo motors, brushless and brushed servo drives and motors, PC based and standalone motion controllers, power supplies, and companion accessories. Its products are used in OEM applications and industries, such as CNC machinery, semiconductor, electronics, inkjet printing, medical, packaging, lab automation, textile, etc. China Leadshine Technology Co., Ltd. markets its products through its global distribution network, which include local distributors. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002981.SZ.summary: Risuntek Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electroacoustic products and components. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Guangdong, China.

002993.SZ.summary: Dongguan Aohai Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of consumer electronics products in China. The company operates in the fields of low-power smart charging, smart mobile power, wireless charging, and integration with power and PC power supplies. Its products include chargers, mobile power supplies, smart homes, and AI hardware, as well as energy products, such as personal energy packs and smart charging posts. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Dongguan, China.

003021.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronic Co., Ltd.
003021.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, manufacture, assembly, and sale of the micro motor, gearbox, and other micro precision transmission systems. The company offers DC motors; DC, palnetary, brushless, brushed, 12V, 24V, stepper, and custom gear motors; planetary, miniature, speed reducer, plastic and metal planetary, electric motor, and custom gearboxes, as well as planetary gearheads; linear actuator motors; and customized products, such as smart home, consumer elecronics, communication, automobile, and intelligent robot drives. It serves automobiles, communication and medical technology, home automation, consumer electronics, intelligent robots, and industry equipment markets. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

003031.SZ.summary: Hebei Sinopack Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells multi-layer ceramic packaging products. The company offers electronic ceramic products for use in the areas of optical communication, industrial laser, infrared detector, microwave communication, automotive electronics, and consumer electronics. It also engages in the import and export business; and the provision of technical consulting services. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

004490.KS.summary: Sebang Global Battery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells lead acid batteries in South Korea. the company offers automotive batteries; industrial batteries; and batteries for use in golf cart and electric vehicles, and electric forklift batteries. It also exports its products to approximately 130 countries. The company was formerly known as Global Battery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sebang Global Battery Co., Ltd. in September 2005. Sebang Global Battery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

006340.KS.summary: Daewon Cable Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cables and wires in South Korea and internationally. The company's products include insulated cables, communication cables, aluminum cables, F.E.D. field products, alpha cables, UL certified device cables, and automobile cables, as well as power and control cables, and flame retardant cables. It also offers XLPE cable, a cross-linked polyethylene insulated cable; and conductors for automobile cables. In addition, the company engages in manufacturing of plastic injection molding; waste disposal and hot water production; and real estate leasing activities. Daewon Cable Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Yesan-Eup, South Korea.

006345.KS.summary: Daewon Cable Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells cables and wires in South Korea and internationally. The company's products include insulated cables, communication cables, aluminum cables, F.E.D. field products, alpha cables, UL certified device cables, and automobile cables, as well as power and control cables, and flame retardant cables. It also offers XLPE cable, a cross-linked polyethylene insulated cable; and conductors for automobile cables. In addition, the company engages in manufacturing of plastic injection molding; waste disposal and hot water production; and real estate leasing activities. Daewon Cable Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Yesan-Eup, South Korea.

010770.KS.summary: Pyung Hwa Holdings Co., Ltd. operates in the rubber industry in South Korea. The company offers anti-vibration systems, such as power train mounts, suspension and chassis products, engine systems, engine + belt systems, and other products; hose systems, including fuel, braking/steering, air, and cooling systems; and defense industry products comprising caterpillars, pads, and road wheels. It also provides sealing systems that include engine, transmission, valve body, chassis, chassis shock absorber, and electronic industry products; and metallic materials that comprise drivetrain parts, steering units, brakes, home appliance parts, and electric/hydrogen vehicle parts, as well as designs and manufactures molds and automated machines for automotive parts products. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Daegu, South Korea.

015860.KS.summary: ILJIN Holdings Co., Ltd. operates as a parts/material specialized company worldwide. The company offers high voltage electric cables, Cu wire and aluminum alloys, extra high voltage transformers and blockers, and electrical devices for power distribution. It also provides elecfoil used for secondary batteries; industrial diamonds for automobile, aircraft, energy, and semi-conductor industries, as well as the construction and machinery market; diamond wires; and sapphire ingots and wafers. In addition, the company offers touchscreen panels for smartphones and tablet pcs; and precisive steel tubes for automobiles, hydraulic cylinder tubes for heavy machinery, various shapes for L/M systems, and extra precisive stainless tubes for semi-conductors. Further, it provides composite fuel tanks, and LED lighting and display products; constructs various architectural designs and skyscrapers; and offers acoustic, diagnostic, research, and therapeutic ultrasound based medical systems. Additionally, the company broadcasts various cultural programs; and offers integrated IT solutions, such as system integration, system maintenance, IT infrastructure operation, and IT consulting. ILJIN Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

017040.KS.summary: Kwang Myung Electric Co.,Ltd develops and manufactures power distribution machinery in South Korea. It offers high and low voltage switchgears; gas insulated switchgears; package switchgears; motor control centers; protection relays and control panels; panel boards; and bus ducts. The company also provides automatic control systems, such as power monitoring systems, machineries/air handling units, digital meters, digital electric power monitoring equipment, water handling devices, SCADA, and current sensors. In addition, it engages in generation and distribution of solar power. Kwang Myung Electric Co.,Ltd was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Ansan-si, South Korea.

020150.KS.summary: ILJIN Materials Co., Ltd. produces and sells elecfoils in Korea and internationally. Its elecfoils are used as core material for electronic products. The company offers I2B that creates the anode current collector of lithium secondary battery; and IHT, a high bending low illuminance elecfoil for FPCB; and UTC, a very thin elecfoil developed suitable for microcircuiting, high density, high integration, and high multilayering of PCBs. The company also provides I2K, an elecfoil used as a negative electrode collector for small lithium secondary batteries; VLP, a special elecfoil with low illuminance and high strength characteristics used for integrated circuit packaging substrates for semiconductor mounting; ICS, a general-purpose product used as the main material for printed circuit board and copper clad laminate; and I2S to expand the capacity of the secondary battery. In addition, it offers ISS a higher tensile item that is being considered for application of next-generation secondary batteries; HVLP elecfoil suitable for high-speed transmission; and TRT/HRT elecfoils used for base station antennas. The company was formerly known as Iljin Elecfoil Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ILJIN Materials Co., Ltd. in 2010. ILJIN Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

033180.KS.summary: KH Feelux Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, engineering, manufacturing, and sale of electronic ballast and lighting systems in Asia, Europe, and North America. It offers FLX, FLXible, AC, MonoRail, FLT track system, Luxfeel, and B2C collection products, as well as dimming systems for use in hotels, department stores, restaurants, offices, residences, schools, leisure clubs, stage sets, retail areas, etc. The company was formerly known as Feelux Co., Ltd and changed its name to KH Feelux Co., Ltd. in March 2021. KH Feelux Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Yangju, South Korea.

0580.HK.summary: Sun.King Technology Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in power electronic components for use in power transmission and distribution, electrified transportation, industrial, and other sectors in the People's Republic of China. It also engages in the research, development, production, sale, installation, and after sale service of electrical/electronic components, including integrated gate bipolar transistors; and production of electrical capacitors and its devices, amorphous alloy transformers, DC current anode saturable dry-type reactors, and FM voltage AC traction devices. In addition, the company manufactures and sells pulsed power equipment, insulated gate bipolar transistor gate units, and other electronic parts. Further, it engages in the technology research of electronic power device railway equipment; distribution and sale of power electronic components; import and export of goods and technologies; and trading of various products and technologies. The company was formerly known as Sun.King Power Electronics Group Limited and changed its name to Sun.King Technology Group Limited in November 2020. Sun.King Technology Group Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

069730.KS.summary: DSR Wire Corp manufactures wire and wire rope in South Korea. It provides high carbon steel wire, music spring wire, hard drawn steel wire, and zinc coated steel wire, as well as PowerMax rope and OT wire. The company offers its products for mooring, lifting, fishing, oil and gas, mining, leisure, logging, crane, automotive, general use, electronics, construction, agriculture, and consumer goods sectors. The company was formerly known as Chunki Wire Rope Industry Ltd and changed its name to DSR Wire Corp in May 2000. DSR Wire Corp was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Suncheon, South Korea.

0724.HK.summary: Ruixin International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in electronic and electrical parts and components in People's Republic of China, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. It also provides management, consulting, and construction and related services, as well as general trading services. The company was formerly known as Sino-Tech International Holdings Limited and changed its name to Ruixin International Holdings Limited in July 2016. Ruixin International Holdings Limited is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.

0725.HK.summary: Perennial International Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in electric cables and wire products. It offers power cords, power cord sets, cables and solid wires, wire harnesses and accessories, and plastic resins and compounds. The company also engages in property holding and license activities. It serves multi-national producers of electrical and electronic products primarily in the United States, Europe, Australia, Mainland China, Japan, and Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Tsimshatsui, Hong Kong. Perennial International Limited is a subsidiary of Spector Holdings Limited.

0842.HK.summary: Leoch International Technology Limited, an investment holding company, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells lead acid batteries under the LEOCH brand name in the People's Republic of China, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, and Asia-Pacific region. The company primarily offers reserve power, SLI, and motive power batteries, such as AGM VRLA, VRLA-GEL, pure lead, UPS high rate, marine, railway, start-stop, automotive, motorcycle, golf cart, scrubber sweeper, and electric vehicle batteries, as well as OPzV, OPzS, PzS, PzV, and PzB tubular plate batteries. Its products are used in various areas, such as telecommunication, power system, radio and television system, railway, solar energy, UPS, emergency lights, security, alarm, gardening tool, car, motorcycle, golf cart, forklift truck, electric vehicle and baby carrier, etc. The company also leases properties. In addition, it engages in the recycle and remanufacture of lead from batteries disposed of. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Leoch International Technology Limited is a subsidiary of Master Alliance Investment Limited.

0LT.F.summary: Leoch International Technology Limited, an investment holding company, researches and develops, manufactures, and sells lead acid batteries under the LEOCH brand name in the People's Republic of China, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Americas, and Asia-Pacific region. The company primarily offers reserve power, SLI, and motive power batteries, such as AGM VRLA, VRLA-GEL, pure lead, UPS high rate, marine, railway, start-stop, automotive, motorcycle, golf cart, scrubber sweeper, and electric vehicle batteries, as well as OPzV, OPzS, PzS, PzV, and PzB tubular plate batteries. Its products are used in various areas, such as telecommunication, power system, radio and television system, railway, solar energy, UPS, emergency lights, security, alarm, gardening tool, car, motorcycle, golf cart, forklift truck, electric vehicle and baby carrier, etc. The company also leases properties. In addition, it engages in the recycle and remanufacture of lead from batteries disposed of. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Leoch International Technology Limited is a subsidiary of Master Alliance Investment Limited.

103590.KS.summary: Iljin Electric Co.,Ltd operates as a heavy electric machinery company worldwide. The company offers heavy electric systems, including high voltage substation facilities, power distribution equipment, fittings, and smart electricity devices; and power cables and systems, such as high voltage cable and accessories, insulated wire, medium and low voltage cable, and overhead transmission line. It also provides mechanical and electrical copper rods, and aluminum rods; and renewable energy solutions, including photovoltaic power plant EPC. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Iljin Electric Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of ILJIN Holdings Co., Ltd.

1166.HK.summary: Solartech International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in cables and wires, and copper rods in the People's Republic of China, the Americas, Europe, Hong Kong, and other Asian regions. It offers cables and wires primarily to the manufacturers of white goods appliances. The company is also involved in the manufacture and trade of plastic products; trading of frozen foods; property holding; provision of financing and management services; holding of mining rights; and trademark holding activities. Solartech International Holdings Limited is headquartered in Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong.

1366.HK.summary: Jiangnan Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in wires and cables in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Power Cables, Wires and Cables for Electrical Equipment, Bare Wires, and Special Cables segments. The company offers power cables primarily for the use in power transmission and distribution systems; and wires and cables for use in the supply and distribution of electricity for various applications, such as industrial machinery, instruments, meters, and household appliances, as well as wires in the buildings. It also provides bare wires, including aluminum reinforced wires, aluminum conductor steel reinforced wires, and aluminum alloy conductors that are used as overhead power lines for power transmission; and special cables and wires for the ship building, wind power generation, and mining industries, as well as rubber, fire proof, and other cables. In addition, the company is involved in the trading of copper conductors, and wires and cables; and engineering, procurement, and construction of electric power related projects. Its products are used in power and general industries, including metals and mining, oil and gas, transportation, shipbuilding, and construction industries. Jiangnan Group Limited also exports its products to approximately 100 countries. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shatin, Hong Kong.

1399.HK.summary: Veson Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of lithium-ion battery modules and related accessories for mobile phones, tablets, and digital electronic appliances in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Original Design Manufacturing Business, Own-Brand Business, Bare Battery Cell Business, and Others segments. It offers power banks, motive batteries and related accessories, power management modules, smart wearable device batteries and related accessories, and lithium-ion bare battery cells, as well as chargers and network terminal products. The company also provides corporate management services. It markets its products through sales network integrating distributors, agents, retailers, and e-commerce. The company was formerly known as SCUD Group Limited and changed its name to Veson Holdings Limited in November 2020. Veson Holdings Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.

1529.TW.summary: Klingon Aerospace Inc. designs, manufactures, installs, and trades in electrical products. It provides switchboards, and potential and current transformers; and electrical supplies, such as circuit breakers, reactors, resistors, high-voltage direct current power supply equipment, and other products. The company also offers network monitoring products, including remote terminal units, supervisory control and data acquisition systems, communication software and hardware, and others. In addition, it is involved in the design and construction of wind power, substation, and cogeneration turnkey works; and water and electricity distribution and construction turnkey works, as well as the provision of repair and test services, and sheet metal parts and aluminum products. Further, the company offers gas isolated switchgear facilities; electrostatic dust facilities; metal clad switchgears; load and motor control centers; matching system reactors; annular tube current transformers; and oil immersion type and molded case transformers, as well as systems engineering and electric power turnkey engineering services. It also provides in-flight solutions, such as air cable, Wi-Fi, mobile, and shopping solutions; and wind power generators and wind/solar hybrid street lights. The company was formerly known as Luxe Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Klingon Aerospace Inc. Klingon Aerospace Inc. was founded in 1978 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

1537.TW.summary: Kung Long Batteries Industrial Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells lead-acid batteries in Taiwan and internationally. It offers products for use in cycling high-power, electric car, deep-cycle, renewable energy, and solar energy applications. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.

1539.HK.summary: Synergy Group Holdings International Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the trading of energy saving products. The company operates through Leasing Service of Energy Saving Systems, Trading of Energy Saving Products, and Consultancy Service segments. It also provides energy management systems solutions; and leases and maintains cooling systems. The company operates in Hong Kong, Japan, Australia, Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, Macau, and internationally. Synergy Group Holdings International Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong.

1597.TW.summary: Chieftek Precision Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells linear motion components in Taiwan. It offers compact linear motor and moving magnet stage products, linear motor servo drivers, magnetic encoders, iron core and ironless linear motors, DD motors, standard 4-row ball bearing linear guides, wide 4-row ball bearing linear guides, standard 4-row roller-type linear guides, miniature linear guides, industrial robots, and ST miniature stroke slide series products, as well as photovoltaic and semiconductor process equipment. The company also provides external NBR seal, metal and plastic caps, metal stopper on rail, and lubrication kit and grease gun. It also exports its products to the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. Chieftek Precision Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

1605.TW.summary: Walsin Lihwa Corporation manufactures and sells bare copper wires, wires and cables, and specialty steel products in Asia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers copper bars, power cables, communication cables, optical cables, and industrial cables for construction, electric engineering, information appliance, power, and telecommunications companies for the use in shipbuilding, heavy machinery, solar and wind power generation, electric vehicles, and robotics; and copper rods, connectors, and components for the cable and wire, communications cable, heavy electronics, and home electrical appliance industries. It also provides stainless steel products, including billets/slabs/ingots, wire rods, straight bars, cold-and hot-rolled coils, precision foils, seamless pipes and tubes, and steel cables and wires, as well as smelting, rolled stainless steel and carbon steel products, and precision alloy wires for construction component, crankshaft, machine tool, plumbing, heat exchanger, drain, and petrochemical industries. In addition, the company engages in the development, construction, operation, management, and rental of residences, offices, markets, estate complexes, and hotels, as well as offers after-sales services. Further, it designs, installs, and manages solar power systems; and manufactures and sells copper alloys, alloy materials, flat-rolled products, and medium and heavy specialty steel plates. Additionally, the company provides mechanical, electrical, communications, and power systems; light emitter diode and solar power assemblies; solar module assemblies; and electronic devices and modules; and construction, business and assets management, consulting, advertising, and commerce services. It also constructs, rents, and sells buildings and industrial factories; and engages in the property management and housing leasing, and solar power businesses. Walsin Lihwa Corporation was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1608.HK.summary: VPower Group International Holdings Limited designs, integrates, and sells gas-fired and diesel-fired gen-sets and power generation systems in Hong Kong, Mainland China, other Asian countries, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, System Integration; and Investment, Building, and Operating. The System Integration segment designs, integrates, sells, and installs engine-based electricity generation units. The Investment, Building, and Operating segment designs, invests in, builds, and operates distributed power generation stations to provide distributed power solutions. In addition, the company engages in the sale and installation of power generation systems; trading of engines and components; and management and technical services. It serves customers in various sectors, including industry-grade and utility-grade DGP stations, governmental, residential and commercial buildings, data centers, hotels, construction works, mining operations, and railway and telecommunications projects. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hung Hom, Hong Kong. VPower Group International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Energy Garden Limited.

1616.TW.summary: Evertop Wire Cable Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wires and cables in Taiwan. The company offers bare and electrical wires; and power, communication, optical fiber, solar, electrical hybrid, water-resistant type, and electric vehicle cables under the EVERTOP brand. Its products are used in the building infrastructure, such as offices, residences, schools, hospitals, and industrial parks; and public transportation, including subways, tunnels, high-speed rail systems, stations, and airports. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1710.HK.summary: Trio Industrial Electronics Group Limited, an investment holding company, operates as an electronic manufacturing service provider for industrial electronic components and products in Europe, the People's Republic of China, South East Asia, North America, and internationally. It provides electro-mechanical products; smart chargers; switch-mode power supplies; and smart vending systems. The company also offers automatic testing equipment, as well as manufacturing management system, tools, and equipment; and sells and develops printed circuit boards and electronics subassemblies. Its products are applied in various industrial electronic equipment, such as renewable energy facilities, telecommunications equipment, commercial freight equipment, medical devices, and security systems. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Hung Hom, Hong Kong.

1725.HK.summary: Eternity Technology Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides electronics manufacturing services in the People's Republic of China, Mexico, Brazil, South Korea, India, Hong Kong, the United States, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, and Austria. The company provides design enhancement and verification; technical advice and engineering solutions; raw materials selection and procurement; quality control; logistic and delivery; and after-sale services for assembling and production of printed circuit board assemblies and fully-assembled electronic products for banking and finance, telecommunication, and smart device industries. Its fully-assembled electronic products include mobile phones, digital projectors, mobile point-of-sale, photovoltaic inverters, tablets, and street lamp controllers. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. As of April 21, 2021, Eternity Technology Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Hong Kong Aerospace Technology Group Limited.

1729.HK.summary: Time Interconnect Technology Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells cable assembly products in the People's Republic of China, the United States, the Netherlands, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company offers copper and optical fiber cable assemblies; and manufactures and trades in robotic products. It serves customers in the telecommunication, data center, and industrial and medical equipment sectors. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Shatin, Hong Kong. Time Interconnect Technology Limited is a subsidiary of Time Interconnect Holdings Limited.

1O2.F.summary: Exro Technologies Inc. focuses on developing and commercializing Dynamic Power Management (DPM) technology and system architecture for rotating electrical machines. The company's DPM technology is a control system that integrates wiring of the rotating machine coils into the power electronics. Exro Technologies Inc. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.

200541.SZ.summary: Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co., Ltd., designs, manufactures, and markets lighting products and electrical equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products primarily include LED light sources and luminaries, automotive LED luminaries, traditional lighting products, and switches and sockets, as well as LED indoor and outdoor lighting products, electrical tapes, and switch panels. Foshan Electrical and Lighting Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.

2061.TWO.summary: Feng Ching Metal Corporation produces and sells copper wires and enameled copper wires primarily for use in electronic, electrical appliance, and communication technology industries in Taiwan and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

2420.TW.summary: Zippy Technology Corp. manufactures and sells micro switches, industrial power supplies, and LED keyboards worldwide. The company offers power supplies for file servers, industrial PCs, storage systems, workstations, blade servers, communication systems, industrial equipment, medical devices, telecom/broadcast systems, and wind power equipment. It also provides sealed, rotary, push, low torque, side mini, slide, rocker, hook, tact, detect, and encoder switches, as well as snap action micro switches for use in consumer electronics, as well as computer, communication device, home appliance, industrial equipment, automotive, medical device, and military applications. The company sells its products under the ZIPPY and EMACS brand names, as well as provides ODM and OEM services. Zippy Technology Corp. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2438.TW.summary: Enlight Corporation develops, produces, and sells LED lighting products in Taiwan. The company's products include LED tubes, laminate lights, bulb lights, flat lights, tablet lights, embedded lights, ceiling lights and lamps, remote control desk lamps, projection lamps and lights, recessed lamps, patio lights, spotlights, track lights, box lights and lamps, and dimmers, as well as track lighting products and household appliances. It also engages in the mechanical and electrical businesses, such as steam piping and hot oil piping works, and equipment installation and glue system piping engineering solutions. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

2440.TW.summary: Space Shuttle Hi-Tech Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells telecommunication wires and cables. The company operates through four divisions: Wires, Electrical Products, Optical Cables, and Optic Electrical. It offers a range of wires for the computer, communication cable, and electronic products. The company sells its products in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Australia, Europe, and the United States. Space Shuttle Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

2457.TW.summary: Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells power supply products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers power adaptors, power over Ethernet products, EV chargers, and worksite radios for personal electronics, networking, POS, small home appliance, medical, industrial, construction, and electric vehicle applications. It serves telecom, datacom, personal electronics, and industrial markets. The company was formerly known as Phihong Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2003. Phihong Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

2489.TW.summary: AmTRAN Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of flat-panel TVs in Taiwan and internationally. It offers OEM/ODM display; MFG LCD monitor; PDs audio device; mouse; and webcam. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

2492.TW.summary: Walsin Technology Corporation manufactures and sells passive components worldwide. The company provides multiple-layer ceramic chip capacitors/arrays, chip-resistors/arrays and networks, RF filters, inductors, disc capacitors, varistors, antennas, chip fuses, thin film products, safety components, modules, etc. Its products are used in mobile device, networking, automotive, industrial, power supply, IoT, green energy, PC and peripherals, and lighting. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

27W.F.summary: PowerCell Sweden AB (publ) develops and produces fuel cells and fuel cell systems for automotive, marine, and stationary applications in Sweden and internationally. It offers PowerCell S2 based solutions that comprise PowerCell MS-30, a fuel cell system for battery-operated electric vehicles; PowerCell PS-5, a fuel cell system that is used for electricity generation, as well as an auxiliary power generator for telecom, traffic, building, and household applications; and PowerCell S2 fuel cell stack. The company also offers PowerCell S3 based solutions, including Powercell MS-100 for heavy-duty use applications; PowerCell megawatt solutions for marine and stationary applications; and PowerCell S3 fuel cell stack for stationary and mobile applications. In addition, it offers engineering services and zero emission solutions. PowerCell Sweden AB (publ) was founded in 2008 and is based in Gothenburg, Sweden.

2F0.F.summary: AB Fagerhult, together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets professional lighting systems for public environments. The company offers indoor and outdoor lighting products, including pendant, linear systems, recessed luminaries, surface mounted, downlight, wall and robust luminaries, decorative and integrated luminaries, spotlight, track systems, catenary and post luminaries, floodlight, bollard, recessed ground luminaries, medical supply units, emergency lighting, and system components lighting control. Its products are used in offices, retail stores, educations, healthcare, fashion and grocery shops, hotels and restaurants, park and city center, roads, residence, sports, industrial, and other applications. The company markets its products under 12 brand names, including ateljÃ© Lyktan, iGuzzini, LED LNEAR, WE-EF, FAGERHULT, LTS, aRLIGHT, eaglelighting, Whitecroft lighting, designplan LIGHTING, i VALO, and VEKO LIGHTSYSTEMS. It operates in Europe, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia, Finland, the United States, Africa, Italy, Netherlands, France, Spain, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Fagerhults Elektriska and changed its name to AB Fagerhult in 1974. AB Fagerhult was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Habo, Sweden.

2FZ.F.summary: Alelion Energy Systems AB (publ) manufactures and sells lithium-ion batteries for forklifts and industrial applications. It offers forklift batteries with lithium-ion technology under the EasyPower name for logistics industry; and tailored batteries under the SmartPower name for automobile industry. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in GÃ¶teborg, Sweden.

2LC.F.summary: Luceco plc manufactures and distributes various light emitting diode (LED) lighting products and wiring accessories in the United Kingdom, Europe, the Middle East, the Americas, the Asia Pacific, and Africa. It operates through Wiring Accessories, Portable Power, and LED Lighting segments. The company offers interior lighting products, including panel, downlight, battens, and high bay; and exterior lighting products, such as floodlights, bulkheads, road lanterns, and bollards, as well as retrofit lamps and tubes, industrial lighting, exterior commercial and domestic site inspection, and lighting control products. It also provides wiring accessories that include switches and sockets, such as USB charging sockets, as well as Wi-Fi, smart, exterior, and IP weatherproof accessories; portable power products, such as cable reels, extension leads, surge protection devices, timers, and travel adaptors; and home entertainment products, including TV mounts, indoor aerials, SCART and HDMI leads, and TV interconnect accessories. In addition, the company offers circuit protection comprises consumer units and industrial switches; and cable management and accessories. Further, it imports and distributes electrical accessories; and provides administrative and development services. Additionally, the company offers automation products; electric vehicle chargers; and LED luminaires, as well as lighting design services. It primarily provides its products under the Luceco, Kingfisher Lighting, British General, Masterplug, and Ross brands. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.

2LC.SG.summary: Luceco plc manufactures and distributes various light emitting diode (LED) lighting products and wiring accessories in the United Kingdom, Europe, the Middle East, the Americas, the Asia Pacific, and Africa. It operates through Wiring Accessories, Portable Power, and LED Lighting segments. The company offers interior lighting products, including panel, downlight, battens, and high bay; and exterior lighting products, such as floodlights, bulkheads, road lanterns, and bollards, as well as retrofit lamps and tubes, industrial lighting, exterior commercial and domestic site inspection, and lighting control products. It also provides wiring accessories that include switches and sockets, such as USB charging sockets, as well as Wi-Fi, smart, exterior, and IP weatherproof accessories; portable power products, such as cable reels, extension leads, surge protection devices, timers, and travel adaptors; and home entertainment products, including TV mounts, indoor aerials, SCART and HDMI leads, and TV interconnect accessories. In addition, the company offers circuit protection comprises consumer units and industrial switches; and cable management and accessories. Further, it imports and distributes electrical accessories; and provides administrative and development services. Additionally, the company offers automation products; electric vehicle chargers; and LED luminaires, as well as lighting design services. It primarily provides its products under the Luceco, Kingfisher Lighting, British General, Masterplug, and Ross brands. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.

2RF.F.summary: RedFlow Limited develops, manufactures, and sells zinc-bromine flowing electrolyte battery modules (ZBMs) worldwide. The company offers ZBM2, an energy storage system with 10 kilowatt-hours (kWh) capacity; and ZCell, a home and office energy storage system with 10kWh of sustainable energy storage.
