Its batteries are used in telecommunications, commercial and industrial, grid-scale, and residential applications. RedFlow Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.

2V3.F.summary: VPower Group International Holdings Limited designs, integrates, and sells gas-fired and diesel-fired gen-sets and power generation systems in Hong Kong, Mainland China, other Asian countries, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, System Integration; and Investment, Building, and Operating. The System Integration segment designs, integrates, sells, and installs engine-based electricity generation units. The Investment, Building, and Operating segment designs, invests in, builds, and operates distributed power generation stations to provide distributed power solutions. In addition, the company engages in the sale and installation of power generation systems; trading of engines and components; and management and technical services. It serves customers in various sectors, including industry-grade and utility-grade DGP stations, governmental, residential and commercial buildings, data centers, hotels, construction works, mining operations, and railway and telecommunications projects. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Hung Hom, Hong Kong. VPower Group International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Energy Garden Limited.

300001.SZ.summary: Qingdao TGOOD Electric Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, and manufactures primary and secondary electric transformers and distribution substations in China. It is also involved in leasing power equipment; constructing and operating energy vehicle charging and discharging stations or points; the provision of financing leasing services; and solid thermal storage business. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300048.SZ.summary: Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells industrial automation control and energy equipment in China and internationally. The company offers medium voltage VFD products, low voltage VFD products, and servo motor drives; powertrain systems, motors, EV chargers, energy automobile products, and components; and energy conservation and environment protection products. The company was formerly known as Hiconics Drive Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2016. Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.

300068.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Narada Power Source Co., Ltd.
300068.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Narada Power Source Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, sells, and services communication backup, motive power, and renewable energy storage batteries and accessories. The company offers VRLA type lead acid batteries, lithium-ion cells and batteries, and related components and subsystems, as well as energy hybrid, DG/battery hybrid, battery cabinet, battery racks and accessories, and home and commercial energy storage solutions. Its products are used in telecom, electric power, railway, and other infrastructure industries, as well as used to store renewable energy from photovoltaic energy and wind farms. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Narada Power Source Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Narada Holdings Co., Ltd.

300073.SZ.summary: Beijing Easpring Material Technology CO.,LTD. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of energy materials in China and internationally. The company offers cathode materials for lithium ion batteries; and NCM532, NCM622, and lithium cobalt oxide materials. It also provides NCA, LCO, LMO, and precursor materials, which are used in electric vehicle, consumer electronics, energy storage terminals, and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300076.SZ.long_name: Ningbo GQY Video & Telecom Joint-Stock Co., Ltd.
300076.SZ.summary: Ningbo GQY Video & Telecom Joint-Stock Co., Ltd. provides visual information system solutions in China. The company offers projection display screen, display unit cabinet, image processing system, interactive electronic blackboard LPD, application management software system, AR-VIS system platform, and cross platform applications, as well as DLP, LED, and LCD splicing display unit. It also provides various solutions, such as visual comprehensive display, public security system, traffic police system, fire system, rail transit, petroleum and petrochemical, power system, information and communication, financial system, water system, utility, 3d stereo mosaic display system, IP streaming media splicing display system, PGIS information system, and project performance, as well as solutions for the mining industry. Its products are used in various fields comprising national defense, government, public security, transport, water conservancy, education, public health, energy, etc. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Ningbo, China.

300112.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Maxonic Automation Control Co., Ltd.
300112.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Maxonic Automation Control Co., Ltd. engages in contracting and distribution of automation process control products worldwide. Its products include electric and pneumatic actuators, flow and level measuring instruments, positioners, signal conditioners, temperature controllers, and valves. The company also provides technical solutions. It serves power, chemical and petrochemical, iron and steel, paper making, and water treatment industries. Shenzhen Maxonic Automation Control Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300120.SZ.long_name: Tianjin Jingwei Huikai Optoelectronic Co., Ltd.
300120.SZ.summary: Tianjin Jingwei Huikai Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells magnet wires under the JWHK brand primarily in China. The company provides aluminum magnet, enameled round copper, enameled rectangular copper/aluminum, film wrapped, glass-fiber wrapped, paper covered, twist aluminum, combined, and continuous transposed conductor wires. Its products are used in electric power, electrical and mechanical facility, electrical equipment, home appliances, electronics, communication and transportation, and other fields. The company also exports its products to Taiwan, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the United States. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Jing Wei Electric Wire Co., Ltd. Tianjin Jingwei Huikai Optoelectronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300124.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of industrial automation control products for equipment manufacturers in China. The company offers standard industrial automation products, including standard drives, such as inverters and optional parts; motion controls comprising servo drives, servo motors, and optional parts; and automatic controls, such as digital instruments, PLC, HMI, and optional parts. It also provides control and drive systems, which comprise integrated drives for elevators and cranes; specialized inverters for cranes and elevators; and specialized servo drives and motors for injection molding machines. In addition, the company offers OEM industry solutions for the elevator, wire and cable, crane, digital control machine-tool, textile and printing, printing and package, and other industries; and reconstruction industry solutions. Shenzhen Inovance Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300141.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co., Ltd.
300141.SZ.summary: Suzhou Industrial Park Heshun Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of electric power and power quality equipment in China. The company offers high and low voltage power equipment, and power transformers; high and low voltage power quality equipment; energy metering devices, including centralized measuring boxes and monomer metering boxes; and electric car charging/changing station equipment, such as DC chargers and AC charging piles. It also provides power capacitors comprising high voltage shunt, collective, dry high voltage shunt, coupling, pulse, circuit breaker, and mica capacitors, as well as TYD capacitive voltage transformers and automatic switching controllers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China.

3002.TW.summary: AHOKU Electronic Company provides smart home solutions. The company offers travel adapters and converters, USB chargers, power sockets, cabinet power strips, outlets surge protectors, wireless IP cameras, wireless chargers, Wi-Fi travel routers, car inverters, AC plugs, battery backups, alarm sensors, passive infrared sensors, smart sockets, moisture sensors, and night vision cameras, as well as wireless security cameras, door and window sensors, and Bluetooth smart sockets. AHOKU Electronic Company was founded in 1983 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

300207.SZ.summary: Sunwoda Electronic Co.,Ltd engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of lithium-ion battery modules worldwide. The company offers portable power batteries, automobile battery and powertrain products, and mobile phone and tablet PC cases, as well as lithium-ion cells, power management systems, and precision components; and systems and integrated energy, automation and intelligent manufacturing, and laboratory testing services. Its products are used in mobile phones, notebooks computers, electric vehicle powertrains, VR products, wearable devices, drones, smart hardware, energy storage and Internet products, power tools, electric bicycles, and other fields. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300208.SZ.summary: Qingdao Zhongzi Zhongcheng Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of power equipment in China and internationally. It offers green power grid products, such as high voltage parallel connecting and filter capacitors, and magnetically-controlled static var compensation devices. The company also invests in the construction of power plants, and grid transmission and distribution facilities; acquires mining properties; and invests in, develops, and operates industrial parks. In addition, it develops and operates in various industries, such as tap water, natural gas, highways, ports, terminals, and fisheries through BOT, IBO, and PPP. Further, the company is involved in financial investment activities. The company was formerly known as Qingdao Hengshun Zhongsheng Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Qingdao Zhongzi Zhongcheng Group Co., Ltd. in February 2019. Qingdao Zhongzi Zhongcheng Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.

300259.SZ.summary: Suntront Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells smart meters in China and internationally. The company offers smart water, gas, heat, and energy meters; and remote devices and other products. It also provides prepayment, automatic meter reading, and technique related solutions, as well as smart management software with various functions, such as file creation, account opening, daily business dealing, sale and multi inquiry, report summary, read/write card, input/collect data, bill printing, blacklist checking, etc. Suntront Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

300265.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Tongguang Electronic Wire & Cable Co., Ltd.
300265.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Tongguang Electronic Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. produces and sells wires and cables in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers fiber optic cables, transmission cables, and equipment cables that can be used in telecommunication, mobile, radio and television, power, railway, other communication, and overhead transmission lines, as well as power cables for architecture, urban lighting, wind power projects, transportation projects, etc. It also provides overhead conductors, including ordinary conductors and energy-saving conductors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Haimen, China.

300274.SZ.summary: Sungrow Power Supply Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services solar, wind, and other energy storage equipment in China. The company offers photovoltaic inverters, such as concentrated, string, and household inverters for ground-mounted, distributed, and rooftop PV power plants; driving systems for new energy vehicles; and floating systems. It also provides iSolarCloud, a remote monitoring and O &M platform for the operation and management of multiple energies. Sungrow Power Supply Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

300283.SZ.long_name: Wenzhou Hongfeng Electrical Alloy Co., Ltd.
300283.SZ.summary: Wenzhou Hongfeng Electrical Alloy Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies electrical contact materials in the People's Republic of China. It offers structured composite electrical contact materials and components; composite clad electrical contact materials and components, including composite button contact materials, profiled contact materials, composite rivet contact materials, clad strips and stamped parts, Cu/Fe/Cu and Cu/Al/Cu clad materials, and novel Cu/Ag/Cu clad materials; electrical contact assemblies comprising staked and welded contact assemblies; and welding and other accessories, such as solder pastes and brazing material systems. The company also provides thermostat bimetal products consisting of stamping parts and strips; and cemented carbide products, including coaling and geological mining products, road repair tools, carbide burrs and rods, tire studs, CNC cutting inserts, non-standard products, wear resistant parts, wood working knives and glass cutters, and tools of processing building materials. Its products are used in industrial electrical equipment, such as AC contactors, miniature circuit breakers, molded-case circuit breakers, intelligent air circuit breakers, relays, and fuses; construction apparatus, including wall mounted switches and socket outlets; automotive equipment, such as thermostats; and communications electronics, which include micro motors and touch switches. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yueqing, the People's Republic of China.

300286.SZ.summary: Acrel Co.,Ltd. provides power monitoring and management, electrical safety, and other system solutions for grid customers in China. The company produces and sells medium voltage measurement and control devices, power monitoring and protection systems, energy metering devices, building electrical and mechanical energy saving controllers, power quality monitoring and governance systems, and power sensors. It also provides installation services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shanghai, China.

3003.TW.summary: K.S. Terminals Inc. manufactures and sells electrical terminals, wire accessories, lighting systems, electric vehicle charging connectors, automotive connectors, nylon cable ties, and green energy connectors in Taiwan and internationally. Its electrical terminal products include insulated and non-insulated copper terminals, insulated quick disconnectors, din terminals, cord end terminals, water proof heat shrinkable terminals with adhesive tubing, butt splice and other connectors, stainless steel ties, JIS terminals, battery modular connectors, and tools, as well as copper tubular lugs. The company also offers continual type terminals, and white goods terminals and housings. The company was formerly known as Ken Shing Industrial shop and changed its name to K.S. Terminals Inc. in 1978. K.S. Terminals Inc. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.

300301.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Changfang Group Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells LED products in China and internationally. It primarily offers LED lamps for whole house, living room, bedding, and kitchen. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Changfang Light Emitting Diode Lighting Co., LTD and changed its name to Shenzhen Changfang Group Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Shenzhen Changfang Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300317.SZ.summary: Jiawei Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. focuses on the research and development, production, and sale of lithium-ion batteries and systems. The company is also involved in the investment, construction, and operation of photovoltaic power stations. In addition, it provides solar landscape, low voltage landscape, and portable solar lights; retrofit, puff, and track lights; and smart security and camera floodlights. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Jiawei Photovoltaic Lighting Co., Ltd. Jiawei Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300341.SZ.summary: Motic (Xiamen) Electric Group Co.,Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and supplies insulation components for electrical transmission and distribution networks, and the electrical power industry. The company offers standard insulators, such as IEC pole insulators, capacitive insulators, and wall and pin bushings; embedded poles; and medium voltage OEM products, such as spouts and embedded poles for insulated switchgear. It also provides high voltage products, including GIS insulators, cable terminations, and hybrid fiber reinforced epoxy composite products. Motic (Xiamen) Electric Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

300342.SZ.summary: Changshu Tianyin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of refrigerator compressor parts in China. It offers mold design centers; overheat and overload protectors; current start relays; PTC starter relays; no power electronic starters; plastic suction mufflers for various refrigerator compressors; plastic spring supports/spring stands; junction boxes for various refrigeration appliances/terminal boxes of appliances; and integrated low power PTC starters. The company offers its products under the TY brand name. Changshu Tianyin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Changshu, China.

300351.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Yonggui Electric Equipment Co., Ltd.
300351.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yonggui Electric Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of connectors in China and internationally. The company offers rail transit connectors, such as EMU, city rail vehicle, traction, railway passenger, and special connectors, as well as axle equipment, accessories, and tools for railway vehicle systems; and new energy products, including high voltage high current, high voltage low current, signal, power, mating, photovoltaic system connectors, as well as charging interfaces, standard battery quick couplers, manual maintenance switches, wind power slip rings, accessories, and tools. It also provides communications connectors comprising D series high density type, D Series mixed type rectangular, D series power supply type rectangular, printed circuit, D series standard, RF coaxial, PWRBLADE power, M8 sensor, M12, YGC562 Goldfinger, LED round plastic waterproof, YGC565 series, PCB micro coaxial connectors, as well as AISG male plug terminals, accessories, and tools; and military anti-explosion connectors. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tiantai, China.

300414.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Zhongguang Lightning Protection Technologies Co., Ltd.
300414.SZ.summary: Sichuan Zhongguang Lightning Protection Technologies Co., Ltd. provides various professional lightning protection solutions in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers lighting road, earthing products; and box type, power, signal, antenna feeder, combined, and smart SDP products, as well as provides lightning warning and monitoring systems. Its products are used in communication, buildings, wind power, photovoltaic, and LED luminaries sectors. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

300423.SZ.summary: Sunfly Intelligent Technology Co., LTD engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of high and low voltage electrical equipment in China. It offers prefabricated substations, insulated busducts, cable bridges, etc.; and KYN-40.5, KYN28-12, MNS, L-GGD, L-GCS, L-GCK, XGN2-12, HXGN17-12, ZNYBW, and other series of products, as well as supplies CNPC and CNOOC materials. The company also exports its products to Russia, India, Malaysia, Iran, Angola, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Shandong Luyitong Intelligent Electric Plc. and changed its name to Sunfly Intelligent Technology Co., LTD in September 2020. Sunfly Intelligent Technology Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is based in Laiyang, China.

300427.SZ.summary: Red phase INC. provides grid systems, power generation systems, and other products worldwide. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Red Phase Instruments Inc. and changed its name to Red phase INC. in February 2018. The company is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

300477.SZ.long_name: Beijing Hezong Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
300477.SZ.summary: Beijing Hezong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. provides power distribution solutions in China. The company offers gas insulated ring main units, MV/LV air insulated switchgears, prefabricated substations, pole-mounted switches, distribution automation terminals, transformers, cable branching switchgears, and cable junctions, as well as electrical accessories, such as fault passage indicators and premolded cable connectors. It also provides energy management system solutions and distribution network automation solutions, as well as mobile substations. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.

300490.SZ.summary: HNAC Technology Co., Ltd. provides EPC services and automation solutions to hydropower stations, substations, pump station, and water treatment projects in China and internationally. Its products include hydropower automatic systems, pump station automatic systems, intelligent distribution automate systems, water treatment systems, industrial process control systems, DCS control systems, solar power systems, and computer monitoring and control systems. It also offers engineering services, such as pre project consultation, project construction, personnel training, financing plan management, debugging, project design, quality control and assurance, and quality service and warranty, as well as procurement, logistics, and installation of complete sets of equipment. HNAC Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

300491.SZ.summary: Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of high frequency switch mode power supply and related products in China and internationally. The company offers modular switch mode rectifiers, controller systems, and DC power supply systems; EV charging stations, including compact and separated DC fast chargers, AC chargers, and charger modules; on-board chargers and DC converters; and railway signal power supply, special power supply, and EPS products, as well as PV grid-connected inverters. Shijiazhuang Tonhe Electronics Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

300506.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co., Ltd. engages in undertaking lighting engineering projects in China. It undertakes projects in the areas of urban night planning, cultural tourism scenic spot, smart street light systems, and light shows. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Minkave City Lighting Technology Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300543.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Longood Intelligent Electric Co.,LTD designs, manufactures, sells, and services electronic products in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent controllers and power supply products, battery management system (BMS) and battery packs, motors, and OEM assembly products. Its products are used in smart home appliances, power tools, lithium-ion battery BMS, LED and HID lighting, electrical motor systems, energy products, and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300545.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Liande Automation Equipment co.,ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial automatic equipment in China and intentionally. It offers production supporting equipment and non-standard automation equipment for LCMs, OLEDs, and CTPs. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300548.SZ.summary: Broadex Technologies Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells integrated optoelectronic devices in the field of optical communications worldwide. The company offers built-in and external temperature-controlled array waveguide grating; fiber array; adjustable optical power wavelength division multiplexer; reflective and light blocking MEMS VOA; silicon-based dimmable attenuator; chassis, box, and bare fiber optical splitter; cabinet and box type PLC splitter; optical splitter with branch; dense fiber array; and optical fiber accessories. It also provides active optical cable, and optical transceiver module. In addition, the company provides wavelength management devices, such as optical power splitters and dense wavelength division multiplexing for fiber-to-the-home access networks and the Internet data center markets. Broadex Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiaxing, China.

300557.SZ.summary: Wuhan Ligong Guangke Co., Ltd. provides optical fiber sensing safety monitoring equipment and IoT application solutions in China. The company offers sensors, demodulators and processors, and operating systems, as well as technical support services. It serves the petroleum, petrochemical, traffic tunnel, perimeter security, electricity, bridge, railway, and security monitoring and information integration sectors. The company was formerly known as WIT Optical Fiber Sensing Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuhan Ligong Guangke Co., Ltd. in August 2002. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Wuhan, China. Wuhan Ligong Guangke Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of FiberHome Technologies Group.

300593.SZ.summary: Beijing Xinleineng Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells power supply products in China and internationally. The company primarily offers DC-DC converters, AC-DC converters, DC-AC converters, rectifiers and high-power supply products, custom power supply products, primary and embedded power products, filters, etc. It provides power devices and power systems primarily for communication, railway, electric, industrial control, new energy resources fields, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300600.SZ.summary: Changshu Guorui Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells marine and offshore engineering electrical/automation equipment. The company offers MV switchboards, marine circuit-breakers, LV controls and switchboards, ship monitoring, power electronicsts, ship handlings, and lighting monitoring. It also provides marine electricity systems and integrated technical services. The company was formerly known as Changshu Ruite Electric Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Changshu Guorui Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2020. Changshu Guorui Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Changshu, China.

300617.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Ankura Smart Transmission Engineering Technology Co.Ltd
300617.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Ankura Smart Transmission Engineering Technology Co.Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of equipment for ultra-high voltage cable transmission lines and ultra-high voltage cable connectors in China. It offers porcelain sleeve terminals, composite terminals, GIS/transformer terminals, intermediate joints, and branch connectors, as well as smart grids. The company also provides gas pipeline bus, GIL casing, and GIL monitoring systems. In addition, it engages in laying materials, and monitoring and control of equipment; provision of design, construction, and equipment comprehensive professional services, including testing, operation, and maintenance; and developing gas pipeline busbar for large-capacity underground transmission. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Liyang, China.

300648.SZ.summary: Fujian Nebula Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells battery test equipment and solutions in China. Its product portfolio includes Li-ion battery pack PCM testers, Li-ion battery pack semi-product/end product testers, Li-ion battery pack cycle testers, power battery pack BMS testers, power battery pack EOL testers, power battery pack working condition simulators, ES inverters, wind-solar- charging-ESS control systems, automatic cell sorting machines, automatic cell and spot welding machines, Li-ion battery intelligent manufacture solution and MES, etc. The company also offers bidirectional inverters, charging piles, plasma cleaning machines, Li-on cell distance detection machines, polarity detect machines, cell holders uploading machines, and cell tidying machines, as well as laser welding and dispensing machines. Fujian Nebula Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

300650.SZ.summary: Tecnon (Fujian) Commercial Lighting Co., Ltd researches, designs, develops, produces, sells, and services commercial lighting products in China. The company offers light fixtures, including track spotlight, recessed spotlight, downlight, linear light, wall light, and decorative light products. It also provides LED signage products; standard and customized LED display products; and rental LED display products. The company offers its products for use in retail shops, hotel chains, supermarkets, business spaces, and offices, as well as in the educational, jewelry, photoelectric, residential, urban landscape, and other industries. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Zhangzhou, China.

300660.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Leili Motor Co., Ltd researches and develops, manufactures, and supplies micro-motors in China. The company offers micro-motors, such as micro stepping, synchronous, DC brush and brushless, HM hysteresis synchronous, U series, and stepper motors; and drain pumps, peristaltic pumps, electronic water pumps, and pump solution components. It also provides precision stamping parts, metal components, and automotive precision stamping parts; and electronic controllers and drives. In addition, the company is involved in equity investment, management consulting, and import and export trade activities. Jiangsu Leili Motor Co., Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

300667.SZ.summary: Beijing Beetech Inc. develops, produces, and sells wireless sensor network related products in China. It offers industrial process wireless monitoring system solutions for use in the areas of smart industry, digital oil fields, smart grids, etc.; mechanical parameters wireless detection systems for use in the areas of equipment manufacturing, research and testing, teaching and experimentation, and defense research; and MEMS pressure sensor chip and module products for use in automotive and consumer electronics. The company is based in Beijing, China.

300670.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Daybright Intelligent Electric Co.,LTD. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of distribution network automation products in China. It offers pole-mounted switch controllers, feeder automation terminals, and distribution automation terminals; digital circuit, voltage, motor, and distribution transformer protection, measurement, and control devices; communication management devices; digital standby power supply auto-input devices; outdoor high-voltage AC load switches and circuit breakers; and power transformation and distribution boxes, electric energy metering boxes, low-voltage cable branch boxes, metal-clad enclosed switch gears, low-voltage draw-out type switch cabinets, box type switching stations, and metal closed box and indoor AC high-voltage looped network switch gears. The company also provides maintenance and repair, consulting, and door-to-door services. It serves customers through sales outlets. The company is based in Nanjing, China.

300693.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sinexcel Electric Co.,Ltd. provides smart electric power solutions in China, rest of Asia, Australia, Europe, and North America. The company offers power quality products, such as active voltage conditioners, active harmonic filters, static var generators, ASVG products, SPC solutions, theta APF systems, Scada systems, and management systems, as well as SVG compensation technology. It also provides EV chargers modules for electric buses and vehicles, AC EV chargers, and DC fast chargers; hybrid and customized energy storage solutions; container type and centralized PV inverters; and lithium and lead acid battery packs. Shenzhen Sinexcel Electric Co.,Ltd. is based in Shenzhen, China.

300700.SZ.long_name: Changsha DIALINE New Material Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd.
300700.SZ.summary: Changsha DIALINE New Material Sci.&Tech. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electroplated diamond wires in China. It offers diamond wires for silicon squaring and slicing, cropping, and silicon filament cutting; and diamond wires for sapphire and magnetic materials slicing, as well as diamond wire loops. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Changsha, China.

300708.SZ.summary: Focus Lightings Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED epitaxial wafers and chips in China. It offers white light chips for LED lighting applications, as well as provides contract energy management services. The company was formerly known as Jucan Optoelectronics Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. Focus Lightings Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

300713.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Increase Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of power electronic products. It offers automotive charging power, power supply, communication power, industrial power supply, and other products. The company's products are used in automotive, electric power, railways, urban transport, metallurgy, energy, communication, and other industries. Shenzhen Increase Technology Shares Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300750.SZ.summary: Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., Limited engages in research and development, production, and sale of electric vehicle and energy storage battery systems in China and internationally. The company's Li-ion batteries are used in electric passenger vehicles, electric buses, electric trucks, and other special vehicles; and energy storage systems are used in renewable energy, grid frequency modulation, communication base station, commercial and industrial building, and household energy storage. Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., Limited was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Ningde, China.

300763.SZ.summary: Ginlong Technologies Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells string inverters worldwide. The company provides single and three phase inverters; data logging sticks and boxes; rapid shutdown devices; and module level rapid shutdown devices, as well as after-sales services. It sells its products for home owners, business owners, utilities, solar developers, and investors in the residential, commercial, and utility scale solar markets under the Ginlong Solis brand. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

300800.SZ.summary: Lihe Technology (Hunan) Co., Ltd. manufactures monitoring instruments for environmental automation. The company offers automatic water quality monitoring systems, air/smoke automatic monitoring systems, emergency testing products, and automated laboratory equipment, as well as an integrated information management platform for environmental monitoring. It also provides system integration and operational services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Changsha, China.

300820.SZ.summary: Sichuan Injet Electric Stock Co.,Ltd. engages in research and development, production, and sale of electronics, microelectronics and power electronics, and other control equipment. Its products include AC DC power supply modules, induction heisting, polysilicon CVD reactor power system, polysilicon ingot furnace power supply, single crystal furnace power supply, sapphire furnace power supply, special power supply, power controller and system, active power filter, and other power products, as well as industrial power system solutions. The company sells its products in the United States, Japan, South Korea, Russia, India, Turkey, Mexico, Thailand, Kazakhstan, and other countries and regions. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Deyang, China.

300822.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Bestek Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of smart controllers and smart products. Its products include lithium battery intelligent control protection devices and motor controllers; and smart induction lamps. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300833.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Haoyang Electronic Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production engineering, manufacture, sale, and service of professional stage, TV, concert, theatre and architectural lighting products worldwide. It offers entertainment HID products, such as moving heads, follow spots, EOLs, and accessories; Entertainment LED products comprising moving heads, theatre fixtures, static fixtures, and EOLs; and indoor and outdoor architainment products, as well as LED displays, including indoor and outdoor, and EOL displays. The company markets its products under the TERBLY brand name. Guangzhou Haoyang Electronic Co.,Ltd. is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300835.SZ.summary: Sinomag Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of permanent ferrite and commutator products. Its products are used in the automobile, transportation, home appliance, electric tool, fitness equipment, and other markets. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.

300843.SZ.summary: Shenglan Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells electronic connectors and precision components. The company offers Type-C series, USB connector, FFC/FPC, connector assembly, WAFER connector, and wiring harness products; new energy products; and TV lens. Its products are used in the consumer electronics, new energy vehicles, and other fields. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China.

300870.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Honor Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures switching power adapters and provides IPC power solutions worldwide. It offers quick chargers, type-C chargers, PD power supply devices, and intelligent home devices under the HONOTO and ASPOWER brands. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300884.SZ.summary: Dnake (Xiamen) Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells video intercom products and smart community systems to the customers worldwide. It offers a range of intercom products, such as SIP and android video door phone, analogue video door phone, smart home product, and wireless video doorbell. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

300907.SZ.summary: Kangping Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of electric tool motors, electric tool complete machines, and related parts and accessories. The company is based in Suzhou, China.

300913.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Zhaolong Interconnect Technology Co., Limited
300913.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Zhaolong Interconnect Technology Co., Limited manufactures and sells data communication cables and components in China and internationally. The company offers internal and external high-speed cables and solutions for cloud computing big data center switching and storage products; communication and data center cables; industrial and medical cables; and data, audio-visual, and control signal transmission and connection solutions for high-definition multimedia devices, VR wearable devices, PCs, drones, and other consumer products. Its products are used in communications and data centers, industrial and medical, high-end consumer electronics, and smart home and other fields. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Deqing, China.

300916.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Longtech Smart Control Co., Ltd.
300916.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Longtech Smart Control Co., Ltd engages in the research and development of printed circuit boards for intelligent controllers. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300932.SZ.summary: Sanyou Corporation Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of relays in China. It produces various types of relays, such as magnetic latching relays, general power relays, automotive relays, and communication relays that are used in home appliances, traffic, industry, energy, information, medical treatment, and other fields. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

300933.SZ.summary: Sinostar Cable Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells wires and cables, and its accessories. The company's products include power cables, electrical equipment wires and cables, bare wires, special cables, and cable accessories. Its products are used in electric power, energy, coal, transportation, petroleum, petrochemical, national defense, urban construction, and other fields. Sinostar Cable Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Yixing, China.

300936.SZ.long_name: Changzhou Zhongying Science & Technology Co., Ltd
300936.SZ.summary: Changzhou Zhongying Science & Technology Co., Ltd manufactures electronic components. The company is based in Changzhou, China.

3043.TW.summary: Powercom Co., Ltd provides power management products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers online and offline uninterruptible power supply (UPS), three phase UPS, line-interactive UPS, functional UPS, accessories, auto voltage regulator, inverter, and other products. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3071.TWO.summary: Adda Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells electronic thermal management products primarily for the information technology industry worldwide. The company offers CPU cooler modules, blower fans, DC axial-flow/blower fans, AC axial-flow fans, and waterproof fans; thermal modules; and accessories, such as metal finger guards and plastic filters. Adda Corporation was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Pingtung, Taiwan.

3092.TWO.summary: Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies various wires and cables for signal transmission, telecommunication, IT, power, auto, medical appliances, and other industries in Taiwan. It offers electronic, electric, and other wires and cables. The company also provides copper rods, wires, and fine wires; tooling for metal press/plastic injection; metal pressed work products; insulation composite Mylar Al. foils; and various wire cables and PC board connectors. In addition, it offers terminals, wire assemblies, and molds; PVC plastic formulations and pellets; and plastic extrusion and injection products. Hotron Precision Electronic Industrial Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3163.TWO.summary: Browave Corporation operates as an original equipment manufacturing/original design manufacturing development, production, and sales company in the optical fiber communication industry in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include compact coarse wavelength division multiplexers and demultiplexers; splitter modules; add/drop filters; amplifier components consisting of isolators and gain flattening filters; fused biconic taper WBC/WDM coupler and planar lightwave circuit splitters; fan-out cabling systems, adapters, and patchcords/pigtails; MPO/MTP cables; and fiber arrays, collimators, and pigtails. The company also provides optical devices and optical module products, such as isolators, couplers, DWDM, IPD, EDFA, ROSA, BOSA, etc. Its products are used in long haul communications network, metropolitan area network, central office fiber-to-the-home, and cloud data center applications. In addition, the company provides contract manufacturing services. Browave Corporation was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3211.TWO.summary: Dynapack International Technology Corporation designs, manufactures, and supplies portable battery packs in Taiwan. The company offers its products for various applications, including notebook/ultrabook PCs, tablet PCs/e-books, smartphones, handy scanners, 2-way radios, power banks, cable modems, server UPSs, and e-bike batteries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3226.TWO.summary: Topower Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells auto parts, power supply and LED products, and auto lamps in Taiwan. It offers auto parts, such as car and truck parts, and auto accessories; ATX and IPC power supply products; and LED products, including bulbs, candle lights, downlights, T bars, mini bulbs, spotlights, and tubes, as well as auto and truck lamps, and LED universal lights. The company was formerly known as Topower Computer Industrial Co., Ltd. Topower Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3290.TWO.summary: Donpon Precision Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automotive electronic products and plastic precision components in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company is involved in mold design, manufacturing, plastic molding, painting and printing, and assembly and processing of professional OEM electrical equipment. It provides automotive electronic products, such as rear-view camera and mirror, HUD, steering wheel switches, audio panel, auto parts molds, air filters, chargers, and trim products, as well as safety products. The company offers camera, backlight module, headphones, power chargers, and mobile phone accessories; and touch glass products, including auto monitors, and mobile phone, tablet PC, and laptop application products. Donpon Precision Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3308.TW.summary: Bestec Power Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, fabricates, markets, and sells switching power supply products worldwide. It provides LED drivers, adapters, open frames, and server/IPC products under the Bestec brand for lighting, medical, ITE, NB and PC, networking, and industrial applications. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3323.TWO.summary: Celxpert Energy Corporation produces and sells battery packs in Taiwan. Its products are used in notebook and tablet, network product, smart phone, power tool, E-bike/E-Moto, and energy storage and UPS battery packs. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3332.TWO.summary: Cincon Electronics Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, sells switch mode power conversion products to the communications, computer, industrial, medical, consumer, and lighting markets worldwide. Its products include single and multiple output DC-DC converters from 1W to 750W, single and multiple output AC adapters from 5W to 150W, open frame AC-DC power supplies from 5W to 700W, and LED power supplies from 15W to 150W. The company also provides modified standard and custom power conversion products. In addition, it offers accessories; and operates iDALI, an app for digital lighting control solution. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

336260.KS.summary: Doosan Fuel Cell Co., Ltd. develops and distributes power generation fuel cells in South Korea. The company primarily offers M400 fuel cell that produces approximately 440KW of power and heat. Its fuel cells are used in power plants, refrigerated warehouses, large buildings, and hot springs, as well as natural gas, LPG, and hydrogen projects. Doosan Fuel Cell Co. Ltd has a strategic collaboration and license agreement with Ceres Power Holdings plc. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Iksan-si, South Korea.

33626K.KS.summary: Doosan Fuel Cell Co., Ltd. develops and distributes power generation fuel cells in South Korea. The company primarily offers M400 fuel cell that produces approximately 440KW of power and heat. Its fuel cells are used in power plants, refrigerated warehouses, large buildings, and hot springs, as well as natural gas, LPG, and hydrogen projects. Doosan Fuel Cell Co. Ltd has a strategic collaboration and license agreement with Ceres Power Holdings plc. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Iksan-si, South Korea.

33626L.KS.summary: Doosan Fuel Cell America, Inc. designs, engineers, and manufactures stationary fuel cells for commercial and industrial applications. It offers Doosan PureCell system, an energy solution for generating clean electricity and heat through an electrochemical process with no combustion or moving parts, and natural gas. The company also provides multi-fuel cell installations for data centers, industrial facilities, and microgrids, as well as single fuel cell applications for commercial buildings. It also offers project development, installation, remote monitoring and control, equipment services, and financial solutions in partnership with finance providers. The company's products have applications in commercial mixed-use, data centers and telcom, education, healthcare, industrial, retail, and utility markets. Doosan Fuel Cell America, Inc. was formerly known as ClearEdge Power, Inc. As a result of the acquisition of ClearEdge Power, Inc. by Doosan Corporation, ClearEdge Power, Inc.'s name was changed. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in South Windsor, Connecticut. As of July 18, 2014, Doosan Fuel Cell America, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Doosan Corporation.

3374.T.summary: Naigai Tec Corporation purchases, imports, exports, and sells pneumatic devices, pneumatic application devices, working machines, electric and electronic devices, and other tools. The company procures and sells mechatronics, including pneumatic equipment, vacuum equipment, drive units, temperature and liquid control equipment, power supply equipment, aluminum frames and FA equipment, environmental and general industrial equipment, logistics and materials handling equipment, and products for semiconductor and liquid crystal industries. It also designs, develops, and manufactures tensile testing machines and durability evaluation machines for rubber materials; sun tracking solar units; creasers and sealing machines; semiconductor manufacturing equipment units, such as prototypes and mass production equipment; aluminum frames structures; labor-saving devices and automated machines; various testing machines for laboratories, universities, and graduate schools; control units for a range of air-related equipment, including drive and vacuum systems; and water-cooled control units. In addition, the company is involved in the assembly and production of liquid crystal exposure apparatus; and creation of assembly procedure manuals and other documents. Further, it provides repair and maintenance services for temperature control equipment, vacuum valves and pumps, and other equipment, as well as semiconductor manufacturing equipment and related machinery. Naigai Tec Corporation was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3393.HK.summary: Wasion Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, researches, develops, produces, and sells energy metering and energy efficiency management for energy supply industries in the China and internationally. The company operates through Power Advanced Metering Infrastructure, Communication and Fluid Advanced Metering Infrastructure, and Advanced Distribution Operations segments. It offers smart meters, smart water meters, smart gas meters, and ultrasonic calorimeters; various meters and power quality monitoring devices; energy data collection terminals, load management terminals, and user management devices; and measurement automation systems and various application systems, services, and energy data mining, as well as system solution and communication terminals solution services. The company also offers high voltage switchgears, smart switchgears, circuit breakers, power distribution automation terminals, electrical and electronic devices for power quality control, and smart distribution systems, as well as engineering, energy-saving services, etc. In addition, it provides smart power distribution devices and energy efficiency solution services; and power meters and heat meters, as well as trades in electronic components. The company was formerly known as Wasion Group Holdings Limited and changed its name to Wasion Holdings Limited in June 2018. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong. Wasion Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Star Treasure Investments Holdings Limited.

33B.F.summary: Badger Meter, Inc. manufactures and markets flow measurement, quality, control, and communication solutions in the United States, Asia, Canada, Europe, Mexico, the Middle East, and internationally. It offers mechanical or static water meters, and related radio and software technologies and services to municipal water utilities. The company also provides flow instrumentation products, including meters, valves, and other sensing instruments to measure and control fluids going through a pipe or pipeline, including water, air, steam, oil, and other liquids and gases to original equipment manufacturers as the primary flow measurement device within a product or system, as well as through manufacturers' representatives. Its flow instrumentation products are used in water/wastewater, heating, ventilating and air conditioning, and corporate sustainability markets. In addition, the company offers ORION Migratable for automatic meter reading; ORION (SE) for traditional fixed network applications; and ORION Cellular for infrastructure-free fixed network meter reading solution, as well as BEACON advanced metering analytics, a secure cloud-hosted software suite that establishes alerts for specific conditions and allows consumer engagement tools that permit end water customers to view and manage their water usage activity. It also serves water utilities, industrial, and other industries. The company sells its products directly, as well as through resellers and representatives. Badger Meter, Inc. was founded in 1905 and is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

3432.TW.summary: Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various components and products. The company offers cooler and heat pipe components; single card, IO, FPC, board, and battery connectors; and other components that are used in NB PC, mobile phone, 3.5G HSDPA, MFP printer, DVD, and LCD TV applications. It also provides consumer electronics products, such as AC USB adaptors, car chargers, and USB card readers. Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3484.TWO.summary: Solteam Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of modular parts and components for power tool, home appliance, automotive, medical, and IT industries worldwide. It offers switches, inlets/outlets, adapters, battery holders, controller modules, EV parts, surrounding/other products, aquarium peripherals, optical products, and medical devices. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3504.TW.summary: Young Optics Inc. engages in the research, design, manufacture, and sale of optical components, engines, and modules in Taiwan. The company offers plastic injection molds; machining parts, including metal barrel, spacer, retainer, cam ring, and flange products; components, such as plastic lens, glass molding lens, glass grinding lens, color wheels, glass light tunnels, reflection prisms, color filters, x-plates, mirrors, UVIR, and waveguide products; DLP evaluation modules, and DLP LED and UV engines; machine vision, projection, logo, smart head, ADAS, lidar, endoscope, fixed, and varifocal lens; and monocular HMD products. Young Optics Inc. was founded in 2002 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3516.TWO.summary: ADO Optronics Corporation provides lighting products in Taiwan. It offers commercial lighting, indoor and outdoor LED lighting, and plastic injection products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3537.TWO.summary: Podak Co., LTD. operates as a sales agent in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers active and passive components, such as polymer solid, aluminum electrolytic, plastic, and gold capacitors, as well as variable resistors, inductors, power choke coils, diodes, transistors, chip fuses, integrated circuits, batteries, remote controls, motors, and other products. It also provides car electronic components, Blu-ray storage, power capacitor, smart energy saving, automatic equipment, and CO2 heat pumps, as well as high-definition closed-circuit television, consumer monitoring, and camera module solutions. Podak Co., LTD. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3550.TW.summary: Copartner Technology Corporation manufactures and sells cable and wire products for information, communications, and electronics industries worldwide. It offers consumer market cables, including USB, SFP/QSFP, plenum HDMI, and display port cables; and transportation cables comprising vehicle, marine, and aircraft video/audio and control cables. The company also provides industrial cables, such as control, flexible, chain, and robot cables; medical cables consisting of medical equipment, medical auto bed control, auto control system, and non-invasive medical device cables; and green energy cables, including solar tracker and EV cables. In addition, it offers communication cables, such as RG type, AISG, coaxial communication, and LAN cables. The company was formerly known as Cablex Wire & Cable Mfg. Corp. and changed its name to Copartner Technology Corporation in August 2004. Copartner Technology Corporation was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3628.TWO.summary: Ablerex Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells uninterruptible power supplies (UPS) and power quality devices for use in industrial and informatics applications in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers energy storage systems; photovoltaic devices; UPS products and accessories; modular and standalone active power filters; automatic transfer switches; and battery monitoring systems. It also manufactures and sells solar energy equipment, as well as provides maintenance and technical services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3HQ.SG.summary: Dialight plc, together with its subsidiaries, primarily develops, manufactures, and supplies LED lighting solutions for use in hazardous and industrial applications in North America, EMEA, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Lighting, and Signals & Components. It offers high and low bays, and high outputs; conveyor, flood, street, area, and flood lights; LED linear fixtures, such as low profile/top conduit linear, stainless steel linear, glass reinforced polyester linear, battery backup linear, and end-to-end linear; and wall packs/bulkheads, and related battery backup products. The company also provides lighting products for control systems and obstruction solutions. In addition, it offers signals and components, such as panel mount and circuit board indicators; and traffic, vehicle, and rail products. The company serves mining, heavy industry, oil and gas, petrochemical, power generation, pulp and paper, food and beverage, and traffic and signal sectors. Dialight plc was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.

3U3.F.long_name: TATSUTA Electric Wire and Cable Co., Ltd.
3U3.F.summary: TATSUTA Electric Wire and Cable Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electric wires/cables, electronic materials, and sensor and medical products in Japan. The company provides electric wires and cables for power distribution, equipment and machinery, nuclear power plants, and railways and vehicles; telecommunications and instrumentation cables; and insect-resistant cables. It also offers equipment wires and cables comprising high-strength cables, thin high-strength cables, high-strength slip cables, and spatter-resistant high-strength cables; functional materials, such as multi-functional electromagnetic interference (EMI) shielding films, EMI shielding film related materials, conductive pastes, and films for FFC applications; and bonding wires, including gold/gold bumping, silver, copper, and palladium wires. In addition, the company provides sensor products, such as water leakage detection sensors, water leakage detection systems, water (chemical) leakage detection systems, water leakage sheets, and intruder monitoring systems; and medical equipment products, which include liquid leakage sensors, IV counter, liquid control systems for artificial dialysis equipment, optical fiber interference tomography meter for OCT applications, and electric wires for medical applications. Further, it offers optical fiber components, as well as environmental analysis services. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Higashiosaka, Japan.

4576.TW.summary: Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells components, systems, and equipment for linear motion and control system in Taiwan. The company offers controllers and drives, servo and linear actuators, positioning measurement systems, stepping/servo linear motors, linear motor stages, torque motors and rotary tables, direct drive motors, rotary motors, and robots. It provides its products for use in semiconductor, optical component manufacturing, automation, medicare and healthcare, and rehabilitation equipment, as well as transportation applications. The company also sells its products in Germany, Japan, the United States, Italy, Switzerland, the Czech Republic, France, and Israel. Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

46H.F.summary: Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd. provides automation solutions in the People's Republic of China, Southeast Asia, India, and the Middle East. The company offers a suite of industrial automation systems, including third-party hardware-centric products, such as instrumentation and actuators; proprietary software-centric distributed control systems/programmable logic controllers; and valued-added software packages comprising real-time management information system, HolliAS asset management system, operator training system, HolliAS batch application package, HolliAS advanced process control package, and safety instrumentation system, as well as HOLLiAS MACS-N DCS, a proprietary nuclear power non-safety automation and control system. It also provides train control center that monitors route condition, track status, train schedules, distance between trains, and the working status of other function devices, as well as generates control instructions and commands. In addition, the company offers automation train protection that operates as a train over-speed protection mechanism; and supervisory control and data acquisition system, an open software platform. Further, it offers research and development services; and provides integrated automation systems and services, mechanical and electrical solution services, and installation services. The company serves customers in the industrial, railway, subway, nuclear power, and mechanical and electronic industries. The company was formerly known as HLS Systems International Ltd. and changed its name to Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd. in July 2009. Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic China.

49V.F.summary: Vertiv Holdings Co, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and services critical digital infrastructure technologies and life cycle services for data centers, communication networks, and commercial and industrial environments in the Americas, the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. It offers power management products, uninterruptible power systems, thermal management products, integrated rack systems, modular solutions, and management systems for monitoring and controlling digital infrastructure that are integral to the technologies used for various services, including e-commerce, online banking, file sharing, video on-demand, energy storage, wireless communications, Internet of Things, and online gaming. The company also provides lifecycle management services, predictive analytics, and professional services for deploying, maintaining, and optimizing these products and their related systems. It offers its products primarily under the Liebert, NetSure, Geist, and Avocent brands. The company serves social media, financial services, healthcare, transportation, retail, education, and government industries through a network of direct sales professionals, independent sales representatives, channel partners, and original equipment manufacturers. Vertiv Holdings Co is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio.

4EV.F.summary: Electrovaya Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets lithium-ion advanced battery and battery systems in Canada, the United States, and internationally. It provides lithium-ion batteries to power materials handling electric vehicles, including fork-lifts and automated guided vehicles; and electric transportation applications; as well for electric stationary storage and other battery markets. In addition, it provides electromotive power products for electric trucks, electric buses, and other transportation applications; industrial and residential products for energy storage; and power solutions, such as building systems for third parties. The company was formerly known as Electrofuel Inc. and changed its name to Electrovaya Inc. in March 2002. Electrovaya Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Mississauga, Canada.

4G9.F.summary: GBLT Corp., through its subsidiary, German Battery Trading GMBH, operates as a diversified lighting and battery company in Germany, the United Kingdom, the rest of European Union, and internationally. The company produces and distributes residential storage systems; mobile energy storage systems; digital outdoor signs for shopping areas; wall-mounted indoor LED displays for train stations and airports; and SMD LED curtains for large events and conventions, as well as lighting products under the Polaroid brand name. It also produces and sells various types of batteries, such as lithium, alkaline, and heavy duty batteries under the AgfaPhoto brand name. In addition, the company offers LED tubes and battery chemical systems; and medical products comprising hearing aid batteries and latex gloves under private labels, as well as rechargeable batteries and chargers. It serves retail and commercial customers, as well as governments, public services, and industrial customers. The company sells its products through supermarkets, department stores, drugstores, convenience stores, petrol stations, etc. GBLT Corp. is based in Toronto, Canada.

5227.TWO.summary: Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. researches, manufactures, and sells lithium iron phosphate Nano co-crystalline olivine materials (LFP-NCO) in China, other Asia countries, Italy, Taiwan, and internationally. The company also offers olivine-type structure lithium battery materials; and manufactures and distributes batteries, and cars and its peripherals. In addition, it manufactures and installs electricity generation, transmission, and distribution machinery. Advanced Lithium Electrochemistry (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5277.TWO.summary: ProLight Opto Technology Corporation engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LED packaging products in Taiwan. The company offers LED products for use in entertainment, architecture, general, automotive, UV, IR, and plant growing lighting applications. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5281.TWO.summary: StrongLED Lighting Systems (Cayman) Co., Ltd., an investment holding, researches, develops, manufactures, and sells LED lighting equipment in China. The company offers outdoor LED lighting products, including LED flood lights, linear lights, dot pixel lights, and in-ground/underwater lights; and indoor LED lighting products, such as LED wall washers, wall grazers, linear lights, flexible strips, downlights, dot pixel lights, and module lights, as well as smart lighting products, panel lights, and pendant lights. It also provides LED lighting control systems and software; intelligent lighting controllers, touch control panels, and LED lighting circuit expanders; and LED power supplies for indoor and outdoor lighting systems. StrongLED Lighting Systems (Cayman) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

5310.T.summary: Toyo Tanso Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of various carbon materials in Japan and internationally. The company provides isotropic graphite products for use in semi-conductor, mold, renewable energy, and atomic power industries; carbon-carbon composite materials for use in electronics, environment and energy, general industrial furnaces, and automobiles and other means of transport industries; and PERMA-FOIL, a flexible graphite sheet that is used as a seal to note automotive gaskets and packing. It also offers mechanical carbon for sliding parts in high temperature environments, for submersion in chemicals, and in fields where lubricated parts cannot be used, as well as copper-impregnated carbon materials for a pantograph slider; carbon brushes for home appliances and power tools; PERMA KOTE, a SiC coated graphite for use in the semiconductor manufacturing industry; PYROGRAPH, a high purity graphite product; and GLASTIX KOTE, a graphite substrate impregnated or coated with glass-like carbon. In addition, the company provides CNovel, a porous carbon; EVEREDKOTE-B, a high-purity isotropic graphite substrate; TaC/Ta Composite EVEREDKOTE-K, a high-purity tantalum; and KLASTA MATE, a metalÂcarbon composite. Further, it offers technical services, such as machining, heat treatment, high purity treatment, surface treatment, impregnation, forming, and measurement. The company was formerly known as Kondo Carbon Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Toyo Tanso Co., Ltd. in November 1949. Toyo Tanso Co., Ltd. was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

5398.TWO.summary: Inalways Corporation engages in the electronic and power supply components manufacturing, and medical biotechnology businesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides IEC connectors, receptacles, power entry modules, wire assemblies, and AC ducks and DC jacks. It also offers prescription and OTC drugs, medical devices, and health supplements. The company was formerly known as Liwei Industrial Co., Ltd and changed its name to Inalways Corporation in July 2017. Inalways Corporation was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5801.T.summary: Furukawa Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells telecommunications, energy, automobile, electronic parts, and construction products worldwide. It operates through Infrastructure, Automotive Products & Materials, Functional Products, and Service and Developments segments. The company offers telecommunications products, such as broadband systems, routers/network equipment, and wireless products; and optical fiber cables and identifiers, optical closures/termination boxes, optical connectors/cords, fusion splicers/optical connecting tools, optical fiber line monitoring/management systems, optical component/devices, and metal communication cables, as well as wiring materials. It also offers energy products, including power cables, cable-related equipment/connection and terminal products, industrial machine-related equipment, fire-prevention products, electrical conductors, power distribution products, and cable conduit materials; and automobile products comprising wire harnesses, connectors, functional products and materials, and interior finishing materials. In addition, the company provides electronics parts materials, fluorescent lamps, and LED reflectors, as well as healthcare products, such as polyimide tubes and shape memory/super-elastic alloys; construction products, including water distribution piping and fluid transport piping products, heat insulators, and cable-related equipment/connection and terminal products; and superconducting cables, industrial lasers, single cell hunters, flow cytometers, and fluorescent silica nanoparticles. Furukawa Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5803.T.summary: Fujikura Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells wires and cables in Japan, the United States, China, and internationally. The company operates in four segments: Power & Telecommunication Systems Company, Electronics Business Company, Automotive Products Company, and Real Estate Business Company. It offers power and telecommunication systems products, including twisted pair cables, coaxial cables, eco cables, conductors, OHTL and power cables, magnet wires, energy harvesting products, optical fibers/fiber cables, splicers and others, optical components, optical connectors/connected parts, specialty fibers, optical applied products, optical camera link cable assemblies, and fiber lasers. The company also offers electronics products, such as sensors, electrical components, electronic wires, thermal products, and connectors; automotive components, automotive wires, wire harnesses, relay connectors, main fuse and joint boxes, and other products; and superconductors, medical devices, and wireless communications modules. In addition, it develops a complex facility to combine businesses, shopping, and amenities; leases offices; and provides real estate brokerage, professional lessons, golf school, and event services. Fujikura Ltd. was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5805.T.summary: SWCC Showa Holdings Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the energy systems, communication systems, and device businesses in Japan and internationally. The company's Electrical Wire and Wire Rod Operations segment offers bare wires, rubber/plastic insulated wires, power distribution equipment, bus cables, and overhead cables. Its Energy System Operations segment is involved in the provision of electric power cables, power cable accessories, and power cable and communication system installation works. The company's Magnet Wire Operations segment provides magnet wires. Its Communication System Operations segment offers optical fiber cables, communication cables and accessories, optical peripheral devices/connector assemblies, and network solutions. The company's Device Operations segment provides wire harnesses, devices for seismic isolation, vibration dampers/isolators, and devices for photocopiers and printing machines. Its Others segment engages in the distribution, superconducting wire operation, and other activities. The company also produces and sells rollers for information processing equipment, seismic isolators and vibration dampers, vibration isolation rubber, etc., as well as fire-proof and coated wires; and sells vibration-control equipment, air spring vibration isolators, optical instrumentation units, precision surface plates, and electrical and electronic equipment. In addition, it is involved in the development and maintenance of systems; security and network development; design/execution/supervision of electric works; disassembly of electric wires and cables; transportation activities through motor trucks; management of warehouses; shipment and delivery operations; production and sale of copier components and oxygen-free copper products; production and sale of drums for electric wires; and provision of electricity distribution equipment. SWCC Showa Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Kawasaki, Japan.

5807.T.summary: Totoku Electric Co., Ltd. develops and sells electric wires, heater products, and cable and wire processed products in Japan. The company offers triple insulated winding wires, heat resistance wires, extra fine alloy wires, high frequency cable assemblies, suspension wires, contact probes, high mechanical strength lead wires, and flexible flat cables. It also provides information and communication cables, equipment wires, heater wires, coaxial cables, and precision coils. Totoku Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1940 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Totoku Electric Co., Ltd, operates as a subsidiary of Furukawa Electric Co., Ltd.

5809.T.long_name: TATSUTA Electric Wire and Cable Co., Ltd.
5809.T.summary: TATSUTA Electric Wire and Cable Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of electric wires/cables, electronic materials, and sensor and medical products in Japan. The company provides electric wires and cables for power distribution, equipment and machinery, nuclear power plants, and railways and vehicles; telecommunications and instrumentation cables; and insect-resistant cables. It also offers equipment wires and cables comprising high-strength cables, thin high-strength cables, high-strength slip cables, and spatter-resistant high-strength cables; functional materials, such as multi-functional electromagnetic interference (EMI) shielding films, EMI shielding film related materials, conductive pastes, and films for FFC applications; and bonding wires, including gold/gold bumping, silver, copper, and palladium wires. In addition, the company provides sensor products, such as water leakage detection sensors, water leakage detection systems, water (chemical) leakage detection systems, water leakage sheets, and intruder monitoring systems; and medical equipment products, which include liquid leakage sensors, IV counter, liquid control systems for artificial dialysis equipment, optical fiber interference tomography meter for OCT applications, and electric wires for medical applications. Further, it offers optical fiber components, as well as environmental analysis services. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Higashiosaka, Japan.
